item.title: Redux-Saga
item.description: Redux-Thunk -> Redux-Sagaâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Redux-Thunk -> Redux-Saga

ê¸°ì¡´ Reduxì—ì„œ ë¹„ë™ê¸° ì‘ì—…ì„ ìˆ˜í–‰í•  ë•Œ, Redux-Thunkë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•´ì™”ë‹¤.

export const getUserData_Thunk = (
  name : string, 
  history : _History.History
) => async (
    dispatch
  ) => {
  if(name.replace(/ /g,'')){
    dispatch(loadingToggle(true));
    try {
      const data : UserInfo = await API.getUserData(name.replace(/ /g,''));
      dispatch(getUserData(data, false))
      history.replace(`/userInfo/${name}`)
    } catch(err) {
      alert(err.message);
      dispatch(loadingToggle(false));
      history.replace(`/`)
    }
  }
}

// actions.ts
export function* getUserData_Saga(action){
  const name = action.name.replace(/ /g,'');
  const history = action.history;
  if(name){
    yield put(loadingToggle(true));
    try {
      // const store = yield select(state => state);
      const data = yield call(API.getUserData, name);
      yield put(getUserData(data, false))
      history.replace(`/userInfo/${name}`)
    } catch(err) {
      alert(err.message);
      yield put(loadingToggle(false));
      history.replace(`/`)
    }
  }
}

export function* watchSaga() {
  yield takeLatest(GET_USER_DATA_SAGA, getUserData_Saga);
}

export function* rootSaga() {
  yield all([watchSaga()]);
}

const TAKE_LATEST_TEST = 'TAKE_LATEST_TEST' as const;
const TAKE_LATEST_TEST_CALLER = 'TAKE_LATEST_TEST_CALLER' as const;

const delay = (ms) => new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, ms))

  num
) => ({type : TAKE_LATEST_TEST, num})

  yield delay(1000*val)
  yield put({type : TAKE_LATEST_TEST_CALLER, val});

  yield takeLatest(TAKE_LATEST_TEST, takeLatestTest);

// 404.tsx
const Custom404 = () => {
  if(typeof window === 'undefined') return null;
  const l = window.location;
  let pathSegmentsToKeep = 0;
  l.replace(l.protocol + '//' + l.hostname + (l.port ? ':' + l.port : '') +
  l.pathname.split('/').slice(0, 1 + pathSegmentsToKeep).join('/') + '/?/' +
  l.pathname.slice(1).split('/').slice(pathSegmentsToKeep).join('/').replace(/&/g, '~and~') +
  (l.search ? '&' + l.search.slice(1).replace(/&/g, '~and~') : '') +
  l.hash)


  return <div>404ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤</div>;
}

export default Custom404;

// index.tsx
if(
  typeof window !== 'undefined' &&
  router.asPath !== '/'
){
  (function(l) {
    if (l.search[1] === '/' ) {
      var decoded = l.search.slice(1).split('&').map(function(s) { 
        return s.replace(/~and~/g, '&')
      }).join('?');

      router.push(decoded + l.hash)
    }
  }(window.location))
  return null;
}

export const getStaticPaths: GetStaticPaths = async () => {
  // Get the paths we want to pre-render based on users
  const paths = sampleUserData.map((user) => ({
    params: { id: user.id.toString() },
  }))
  // We'll pre-render only these paths at build time.
  // { fallback: false } means other routes should 404.
  return { paths, fallback: false }
}

// This function gets called at build time on server-side.
// It won't be called on client-side, so you can even do
// direct database queries.
export const getStaticProps: GetStaticProps = async ({ params }) => {
  try {
    const id = params?.id
    const item = sampleUserData.find((data) => data.id === Number(id))
    // By returning { props: item }, the StaticPropsDetail component
    // will receive `item` as a prop at build time
    return { props: { item } }
  } catch (err) {
    return { props: { errors: err.message } }
  }
}

function solution(numbers) {
    const arr = numbers.split('');
    const sosu = new Set();
    
    const find = (num) => {
        let bool = true;
        if(num < 2) return false;
        for(let i = 2; i < num; i++){
            if(num % i === 0){
                bool = false;
                break;
            }
            bool = true;
        }
        return bool;
    }
    
    const func = (arr, str) => {
        for(let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++){
            const newArr = [...arr];
            const newStr = str + arr[i];
            newArr.splice(i, 1)
            if(find(newStr*1)) sosu.add(newStr*1);
            func(newArr, newStr)
        }
    }
    
    func(arr, '');
    return sosu.size
}

1ë²ˆ ë¬¸ì œë¶€í„° ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ ë¬¸ì œê¹Œì§€ì˜ ì •ë‹µì´ ìˆœì„œëŒ€ë¡œ ë“¤ì€ ë°°ì—´ answersê°€ ì£¼ì–´ì¡Œì„ ë•Œ, ê°€ì¥ ë§ì€ ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ë§íŒ ì‚¬ëŒì´ ëˆ„êµ¬ì¸ì§€ ë°°ì—´ì— ë‹´ì•„ return í•˜ë„ë¡ solution í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì‘ì„±í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.

ì œí•œì‚¬í•­

  • ì‹œí—˜ì€ ìµœëŒ€ 10,000 ë¬¸ì œë¡œ êµ¬ì„±ë˜ì–´ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.
  • ë¬¸ì œì˜ ì •ë‹µì€ 1, 2, 3, 4, 5ì¤‘ í•˜ë‚˜ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.
  • ê°€ì¥ ë†’ì€ ì ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë°›ì€ ì‚¬ëŒì´ ì—¬ëŸ¿ì¼ ê²½ìš°, returní•˜ëŠ” ê°’ì„ ì˜¤ë¦„ì°¨ìˆœ ì •ë ¬í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.

í•´ê²°

  • ê°ê°ì˜ íŒ¨í„´ì„ ê¸°ë¡í•¨
  • ë™ì¼í• ë•Œë§ˆë‹¤ ì¹´ìš´íŠ¸ë¥¼ ëŠ˜ë ¤ì¤Œ
  • ì œì¼ í° ì¹´ìš´íŠ¸ì˜ ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ë§Œ ë‚¨ê¸°ê±°ë‚˜, ë™ì¼í•˜ë‹¤ë©´ ë‹¤ìŒ ê³µê°„ì— ì±„ì›€
function solution(answers){
    const arr = [0,0,0];
    const one = [1,2,3,4,5];
    const two = [2,1,2,3,2,4,2,5];
    const three = [3,3,1,1,2,2,4,4,5,5];

    answers.forEach((res, index) => {
        if(one[index%one.length] === res) arr[0]++;
        if(two[index%two.length] === res) arr[1]++;
        if(three[index%three.length] === res) arr[2]++;
    })
    
    const answer = [1];
    let val = arr[0];
    arr.forEach((res, index) => {
        if(index===0) return;
        if(res === val) answer[answer.length] = index+1;
        if(res > val){
            val = res;
            answer[0] = index+1;
        }
    })
    
    return answer.sort((a, b) => a-b)
}

// ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì‚¬ëŒì˜ ë‹µ
// filterë¡œ ë™ì¼í•œ ê²½ìš° ë‹´ì€ ë’¤, ê°¯ìˆ˜ë§Œ ì²´í¬í•¨
// max apië¡œ ìµœëŒ€ê°’ì„ ì°¾ê³ , ê°ê°ì˜ ê°¯ìˆ˜ê°€ ë‹´ê¸´ ë³€ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì²´í¬í•˜ì—¬ ë°˜í™˜í•¨.

// ì–´ì°¨í”¼ ê²½ìš°ëŠ” 3ê°€ì§€ë¡œ ì •í•´ì ¸ìˆê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì—, ì´ì²˜ëŸ¼ ê°ê° ë³€ìˆ˜ì— í• ë‹¹í•˜ëŠ” ë°©ë²•ì´ ì¢‹ì€ë“¯ í•¨.
function solution(answers){
    const one = [1,2,3,4,5];
    const two = [2,1,2,3,2,4,2,5];
    const three = [3,3,1,1,2,2,4,4,5,5];
    const answer = [];
    const nOne = answers.filter((res, i) => res === one[i%one.length]).length;
    const nTwo = answers.filter((res, i) => res === two[i%two.length]).length;
    const nThree = answers.filter((res, i) => res === three[i%three.length]).length;
    const max = Math.max(nOne, nTwo, nThree);
    
    if(nOne === max) answer.push(1);
    if(nTwo === max) answer.push(2);
    if(nThree === max) answer.push(3);
    return answer;
}

ê·¸ë¦¬ê³ , Next.jsë¥¼ í•™ìŠµí•˜ë˜ ë„ì¤‘, í•´ë‹¹ ìš©ì–´ë¥¼ ë‹¤ì‹œ ë§Œë‚˜ê²Œ ë˜ì—ˆë‹¤.

Before we talk about data fetching, letâ€™s talk about one of the most important concepts in Next.js: Pre-rendering.

By default, Next.js pre-renders every page. This means that Next.js generates HTML for each page in advance, instead of having it all done by client-side JavaScript. Pre-rendering can result in better performance and SEO.

Each generated HTML is associated with minimal JavaScript code necessary for that page. When a page is loaded by the browser, its JavaScript code runs and makes the page fully interactive. (This process is called hydration.)

function solution(numbers) {

ë°°ì—´ array, [i, j, k]ë¥¼ ì›ì†Œë¡œ ê°€ì§„ 2ì°¨ì› ë°°ì—´ commandsê°€ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ë¡œ ì£¼ì–´ì§ˆ ë•Œ, commandsì˜ ëª¨ë“  ì›ì†Œì— ëŒ€í•´ ì•ì„œ ì„¤ëª…í•œ ì—°ì‚°ì„ ì ìš©í–ˆì„ ë•Œ ë‚˜ì˜¨ ê²°ê³¼ë¥¼ ë°°ì—´ì— ë‹´ì•„ return í•˜ë„ë¡ solution í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì‘ì„±í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.

  • arrayì˜ ê¸¸ì´ëŠ” 1 ì´ìƒ 100 ì´í•˜ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.
  • arrayì˜ ê° ì›ì†ŒëŠ” 1 ì´ìƒ 100 ì´í•˜ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

function solution(array, commands) {
    var answer = [];
    return commands.map(res => {
        let arr = [];
        let i = res[0]-1;
        let k = res[1]-1;
        // ì‹œì‘ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ì™€ ì¢…ë£Œì¸ë±ìŠ¤ë¥¼ íŒŒì•…í•˜ì—¬, ë‚´ë¶€ì˜ ê°’ë“¤ë§Œ ë‹´ê¸°
        while(i <= k) {
            arr.push(array[i])
            i++
        }
        // ìˆœì„œëŒ€ë¡œ ì •ë ¬ í›„ ë°˜í™˜
        return arr.sort((a, b) => a-b)[res[2]-1]
    })
}

ë‹¤ë¥¸ì‚¬ëŒì˜ í’€ì´

function solution(array, commands) {
    return commands.map(command => {
        const [sPosition, ePosition, position] = command
        // commandsìˆœíšŒë¥¼ ëŒë ¤ì„œ, ì‹œì‘ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ ì¢…ë£Œì¸ë±ìŠ¤ íŒŒì•… í›„, ìˆ«ìë°°ì—´ì„ filterë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•´ ì‹œì‘ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ì™€ ì¢…ë£Œì¸ë±ìŠ¤ ì‚¬ì´ì¸ ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ê°–ê³ ìˆëŠ” ê°’ë§Œ ë°˜í™˜
        const newArray = array
            .filter((value, fIndex) => fIndex >= sPosition - 1 && fIndex <= ePosition - 1)
            .sort((a,b) => a - b)    

        return newArray[position - 1]
    })
}
// ì›ë¦¬ëŠ” ë‚´ê°€ í•œê²ƒê³¼ ë¹„ìŠ·í•˜ì§€ë§Œ, ë³€ìˆ˜ìƒì„±ì„ ìµœì†Œí™”í•˜ì—¬ ë¶ˆí•„ìš”í•œ ê³µê°„ì„ ì¤„ì¸ë“¯ í•˜ë‹¤.

item.content:encoded:

í”„ë¡œê·¸ë˜ë¨¸ìŠ¤ íŒ€ì—ì„œëŠ” ê¸°ëŠ¥ ê°œì„  ì‘ì—…ì„ ìˆ˜í–‰ ì¤‘ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê° ê¸°ëŠ¥ì€ ì§„ë„ê°€ 100%ì¼ ë•Œ ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ì— ë°˜ì˜í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.
ë˜, ê° ê¸°ëŠ¥ì˜ ê°œë°œì†ë„ëŠ” ëª¨ë‘ ë‹¤ë¥´ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ë’¤ì— ìˆëŠ” ê¸°ëŠ¥ì´ ì•ì— ìˆëŠ” ê¸°ëŠ¥ë³´ë‹¤ ë¨¼ì € ê°œë°œë  ìˆ˜ ìˆê³ , ì´ë•Œ ë’¤ì— ìˆëŠ” ê¸°ëŠ¥ì€ ì•ì— ìˆëŠ” ê¸°ëŠ¥ì´ ë°°í¬ë  ë•Œ í•¨ê»˜ ë°°í¬ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
ë¨¼ì € ë°°í¬ë˜ì–´ì•¼ í•˜ëŠ” ìˆœì„œëŒ€ë¡œ ì‘ì—…ì˜ ì§„ë„ê°€ ì íŒ ì •ìˆ˜ ë°°ì—´ progressesì™€ ê° ì‘ì—…ì˜ ê°œë°œ ì†ë„ê°€ ì íŒ ì •ìˆ˜ ë°°ì—´ speedsê°€ ì£¼ì–´ì§ˆ ë•Œ ê° ë°°í¬ë§ˆë‹¤ ëª‡ ê°œì˜ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì´ ë°°í¬ë˜ëŠ”ì§€ë¥¼ return í•˜ë„ë¡ solution í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì™„ì„±í•˜ì„¸ìš”.

ì œí•œì‚¬í•­

  • ì‘ì—…ì˜ ê°œìˆ˜(progresses, speedsë°°ì—´ì˜ ê¸¸ì´)ëŠ” 100ê°œ ì´í•˜ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.
  • ì‘ì—… ì§„ë„ëŠ” 100 ë¯¸ë§Œì˜ ìì—°ìˆ˜ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.
  • ì‘ì—… ì†ë„ëŠ” 100 ì´í•˜ì˜ ìì—°ìˆ˜ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.
  • ë°°í¬ëŠ” í•˜ë£¨ì— í•œ ë²ˆë§Œ í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìœ¼ë©°, í•˜ë£¨ì˜ ëì— ì´ë£¨ì–´ì§„ë‹¤ê³  ê°€ì •í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì˜ˆë¥¼ ë“¤ì–´ ì§„ë„ìœ¨ì´ 95%ì¸ ì‘ì—…ì˜ ê°œë°œ ì†ë„ê°€ í•˜ë£¨ì— 4%ë¼ë©´ ë°°í¬ëŠ” 2ì¼ ë’¤ì— ì´ë£¨ì–´ì§‘ë‹ˆë‹¤.

í•´ê²°

function solution(progresses, speeds) {
    // ë‚¨ì€ ì‘ì—…ì˜ì—­ì„ ê³„ì‚°í•˜ê³ , ì‘ì—…ì„ë„ë¡œ ë‚˜ëˆˆ ë’¤ ëª«ì„ ì˜¬ë¦¼í•´ì¤€ë‹¤.
    const arr = progresses.map((res, index) => {
        return Math.ceil((100-res)/speeds[index])
    })
    let prev = arr[0];
    let answer = [0];
    arr.forEach((res, index) => {
        const length = answer.length;
        // ì´ì „ì˜ ì‘ì—…ë³´ë‹¤ ë¨¼ì € ëë‚˜ëŠ” ì‘ì—…ì¼ ê²½ìš° ë°°ì—´ì˜ ê°€ì¥ ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ì— ++
        if(res <= prev){
            answer[length-1]++;
        }else{
        // ì´ì „ì˜ ì‘ì—…ë³´ë‹¤ ëŠ¦ê²Œ ëë‚˜ëŠ” ì‘ì—…ì¼ ê²½ìš°, ê¸°ì¤€ì´ë˜ëŠ” prevê°€ ë˜ë©° ë°°ì—´ì— 1 ì¶”ê°€
            answer[length]=1;
            prev=res;
        }        
    })
    return answer
}

ë‹¤ë¥¸ì‚¬ëŒì˜ í’€ì´

// ì‘ì—… ì‹œê°„ì—ëŒ€í•œ ë°°ì—´ì„ ê³„ì‚°í•˜ëŠ”ê²ƒê¹Œì§€ëŠ” ë™ì¼í•˜ì§€ë§Œ, indexë˜í•œ ì¹´ìš´íŒ… ë˜ê²Œ í•˜ì—¬ ì¡°ê¸ˆ ë” íš¨ìœ¨ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì§œì‹  ë“¯ í•˜ë‹¤.
function solution(progresses, speeds) {
    let answer = [0];
    let days = progresses.map((progress, index) => Math.ceil((100 - progress) / speeds[index]));
    let maxDay = days[0];

    for(let i = 0, j = 0; i< days.length; i++){
        if(days[i] <= maxDay) {
            answer[j] += 1;
        } else {
            maxDay = days[i];
            answer[++j] = 1;
        }
    }

    return answer;
}

function solution(participant, completion) {
    const all = {};
    participant.forEach(res => {
        // ì°¸ì—¬ìë“¤ì—ê²Œ ëª¨ë‘ 1ì ì”© ë¶€ì—¬í•¨

        if(all[res]) return all[res]++;

    // ì ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ê°€ì§€ê³ ìˆëŠ” ì„ ìˆ˜ ë°˜í™˜
    const keys = Object.keys(all);

}

function solution(participant, completion) {
    participant.sort();

}

class DirectAddressTable {

const tableSize = 10;
const table = [];

const getSaveHash = value => value % tableSize;
const getStepHash = value => 7 - (value % 7);

const setValue = value => {
  let index = getSaveHash(value);
  let targetValue = table[index];
  while (true) {
    if (!targetValue) {
      table[index] = value;
      console.log(`${index}ë²ˆ ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ì— ${value} ì €ì¥! `);
      return;
    }
    else if (table.length >= tableSize) {
      console.log('í’€ë°©ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤');
      return;
    }
    else {
      console.log(`${index}ë²ˆ ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ì— ${value} ì €ì¥ì¤‘ í•´ì‹œì¶©ëŒ!`);
      index += getStepHash(value);
      index = index > tableSize ? index - tableSize : index;
      targetValue = table[index];
    }
  }
}

ìë°”ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ë¡œ íŠ¸ë¦¬ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê¸°

  • ì´ë²ˆì— ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ë” ìµìˆ™í•´ì§„ ëŠë‚Œì´ë‹¤

    íƒˆì¶œêµ¬ê°€ í•„ìš”í•¨(ìµœì¢…ê°’ì˜ ê²°ê³¼ë¬¼ì´ë‚˜, ë©”ì†Œë“œê°€ í•œë²ˆ ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ì—ˆì„ ë•Œ ê²°ê³¼ë¬¼ì„ ë°˜í™˜) ìì‹?ëŠë‚Œì˜ ê°’ì´ ê¸°ì¤€ì´ë˜ë„ë¡ ìì‹ìì‹ ê³¼ ë¹„êµê°’ë“±ë“±ì„ ì¸ìë¡œ ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ ì§„í–‰

  • ì‚½ì…ì€ í° ì–´ë ¤ì›€ ì—†ìœ¼ë‹ˆ íŒ¨ìŠ¤
  • ì‚­ì œí•˜ë ¤ëŠ” ë…¸ë“œì˜ ìì‹ë…¸ë“œê°€ ë‘˜ë‹¤ ì—†ì„ ë•Œ -> ê·¸ëƒ¥ ì§€ìš°ë©´ëœë‹¤.
  • ì‚­ì œí•˜ë ¤ëŠ” ë…¸ë“œì˜ ì™¼ìª½ìì‹ì´ë‚˜ ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ìì‹ë§Œ ìˆì„ ë•Œ -> ê·¸ ìì‹ì„ ëŒì–´ì˜¬ë ¤ì¤€ë‹¤.

ì‚­ì œí•˜ë ¤ëŠ” ë…¸ë“œì˜ ìì‹ë…¸ë“œê°€ ë‘˜ ë‹¤ ìˆì„ ë•Œ

  1. ì‚­ì œí•˜ë ¤ëŠ” ë…¸ë“œ(í˜„ì¬ë…¸ë“œë¼ê³  í•˜ê² ìŒ)ë¥¼ ì°¾ê³ , í•´ë‹¹ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ì™¼ìª½ìì‹ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ê¸°ì¤€ìœ¼ë¡œ ê°€ì¥ ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ì—ìˆëŠ”ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ì°¾ëŠ”ë‹¤.(ì‚­ì œí•˜ë ¤ëŠ” ë…¸ë“œ ë‹¤ìŒìœ¼ë¡œ í° ë…¸ë“œ)
  2. ë‘˜ì˜ ê°’ì„ ë°”ê¿”ì¤€ë‹¤.
  3. í˜„ì¬ë…¸ë“œì˜ ì™¼ìª½ìì‹ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ê¸°ì¤€ìœ¼ë¡œ, ì‚­ì œí•˜ë ¤ëŠ” ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ì„ ì°¾ì•„ ì§€ì›Œì£¼ë„ë¡ í•˜ì—¬(ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì‹¤í–‰ì‹œì¼œ ìë™ìœ¼ë¡œ ì„¸ê°€ì§€ ì¡°ê±´ì— ë§ëŠ” ê³¼ì •ì„ ê±°ì¹˜ë„ë¡ í•¨) ì™¼ìª½ìì‹ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ìƒˆë¡­ê²Œ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì¤€ë‹¤.
class Node {
  constructor(value){
    this.value = value;
    this.left = null;
    this.right = null;
  }
}

class Tree {
  constructor(){
    this.root = null;
  }

  insert(value){
    const newNode = new Node(value);
    if(!this.root) return this.root = newNode;
    return this.insertRecursive(this.root, newNode);
  }
  
  delete(value){
    if(!this.root) return this.root;
    return this.deleteRecursive(this.root, value);
  }

  insertRecursive(node, newNode){
    if(!node) return newNode; // ì™¼ìª½ì´ë‚˜ ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ ìì‹ë…¸ë“œê°€ ì—†ë‹¤ë©´ ê·¸ëƒ¥ ë…¸ë“œ ë„£ê¸°
    if(node.value > newNode.value) node.left = this.insertRecursive(node.left, newNode); // ìƒˆ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ì´ ë” ì‘ë‹¤ë©´, ì™¼ìª½ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ê³¼ ë¹„êµí•´ë³´ê¸°ìœ„í•´ ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ ì „ë‹¬
    if(node.value <= newNode.value) node.right = this.insertRecursive(node.right, newNode); // ìƒˆ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ì´ ë” í¬ê±°ë‚˜ ê°™ë‹¤ë©´, ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ê³¼ ë¹„êµí•´ë³´ê¸°ìœ„í•´ ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ ì „ë‹¬
    return node;
  }

  deleteRecursive(node, value){
    if(!node) return; // ë…¸ë“œê°€ ì—†ë‹¤ë©´ ê·¸ëƒ¥ ì¢…ë£Œ
    if(node.value > value){ // ì§€ìš°ë ¤ëŠ”ê°’ë³´ë‹¤ í˜„ì¬ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ì´ ë” í¬ë‹¤ë©´, ì™¼ìª½ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ê³¼ ë¹„êµí•˜ê¸°ìœ„í•´ ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ ì „ë‹¬
      node.left = this.deleteRecursive(node.left, value);
      return node; // ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ íƒˆì¶œêµ¬
    }
    if(node.value < value){ // ì§€ìš°ë ¤ëŠ”ê°’ë³´ë‹¤ í˜„ì¬ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ì´ ë” ì‘ë‹¤ë©´, ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ê³¼ ë¹„êµí•˜ê¸°ìœ„í•´ ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ ì „ë‹¬
      node.right = this.deleteRecursive(node.right, value);
      return node; // ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ íƒˆì¶œêµ¬
    }

    // ì§€ìš°ë ¤ëŠ” ê°’ê³¼ í˜„ì¬ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ì´ ë™ì¼í•˜ì—¬ ì§€ìš°ë ¤ëŠ” ëŒ€ìƒì¼ ê²½ìš°
    if(!node.left && !node.right) return node = null; // ìì‹ì´ ì—†ì„ë•ŒëŠ” ê·¸ëƒ¥ ì‚­ì œ
    if(!node.left && node.right) return node = node.right; // ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ìì‹ë§Œ ìˆë‹¤ë©´, ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ìì‹ ëŒì–´ì˜¬ë¦¬ê¸°
    if(node.left && !node.right) return node = node.left; // ì™¼ìª½ìì‹ë§Œ ìˆë‹¤ë©´, ì™¼ìª½ìì‹ ëŒì–´ì˜¬ë¦¬ê¸°

    // ë‘˜ë‹¤ ê°€ì§€ê³ ìˆì„ ê²½ìš°
    let changeTarget = node.left; // í˜„ì¬ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ì™¼ìª½ìì‹ì„ ê¸°ì¤€ìœ¼ë¡œ ê°€ì¥ ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ì—ìˆëŠ” Leafë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ì°¾ìŒ(í˜„ì¬ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ë³´ë‹¨ ì‘ì€ ë‘ë²ˆì§¸ë¡œ í° ê°’)
    while(changeTarget.right) changeTarget = changeTarget.right;
    node.value = changeTarget.value; // í˜„ì¬ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ì„ ì°¾ì€ ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€ê²½
    changeTarget.value = value; // ì°¾ì€ ê°’ì„ í˜„ì¬ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€ê²½
    node.left = this.deleteRecursive(node.left, value); // í˜„ì¬ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ì™¼ìª½ìì‹ì„ ê¸°ì¤€ìœ¼ë¡œ í•˜ì—¬ ì§€ìš°ë ¤ëŠ” ê°’ì„ ì‚­ì œí•˜ëŠ” ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ ì§„í–‰ í›„, ìƒˆë¡­ê²Œ ì™¼ìª½ìì‹íŠ¸ë¦¬ ìƒì„±
    return node; // ì¬ê·€í•¨ìˆ˜ íƒˆì¶œêµ¬
  }
}

const tree = new Tree();
tree.insert(6);
tree.insert(10);
tree.insert(7);
tree.insert(4);
tree.insert(12);
tree.insert(15);
tree.insert(1);
tree.insert(3);
tree.insert(2);
tree.insert(5);
tree.delete(6)
console.log(tree);

êµ¬í˜„ë°©ì‹

class Graph {
  constructor(){
    this.vertexes = {};
  }

  addVertex(vertex){
    this.vertexes[vertex] = {value : vertex};
  }

  addEdge(vertex1, vertex2, weight){
    this.vertexes[vertex1][vertex2] = weight;
    this.vertexes[vertex2][vertex1] = weight;
  }
}

const graph = new Graph;

graph.addEdge('ì¼ì‚°ë™êµ¬', 'ë•ì–‘êµ¬', 2)

ìš©ì–´

  • ê°„ì„ (ì—£ì§€) : ë…¸ë“œë“¤ì„ ì—°ê²°í•˜ëŠ” ì„ 
  • ì°¨ìˆ˜ : í•˜ë‚˜ì˜ ë…¸ë“œì— ë‹¿ëŠ” ê°„ì„ ì˜ ìˆ˜
  • ì¸ì ‘ : ê°„ì„ ì„ í•œë²ˆë§Œ í†µí•´ ê°ˆ ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” ê²½ìš°
  • ë¬´ë°©í–¥ ê·¸ë˜í”„(ìŒë°©í–¥) : í˜ì´ìŠ¤ë¶ê³¼ ê°™ì´, ì¹œêµ¬ë¥¼ ë§ºìœ¼ë©´ ìƒí˜¸ ì¹œêµ¬ê°€ ë¨
  • ë‹¨ë°©í–¥ ê·¸ë˜í”„ : ì¸ìŠ¤íƒ€ëŠ” ë‹¤ë¥¸ì‚¬ìš©ìë¥¼ íŒ”ë¡œìš° í•œë‹¤ê³  í•´ì„œ ì„œë¡œ ìƒí˜¸íŒ”ë¡œìš° ë˜ì§€ëŠ” ì•ŠìŒ

Refactoring

  • Class101 ê³¼ì œ í”¼ë“œë°± ì´í›„, ì œì¶œí–ˆë˜ ê³¼ì œë¥¼ í”¼ë“œë°±ì— ë”°ë¼ í•˜ë‚˜í•˜ë‚˜ ìˆ˜ì •í•´ë³´ì•˜ë‹¤.

ì½”ë“œì˜ ê°€ë…ì„± ë¬¸ì œ

// ë³€ê²½ ì „
// ì›ë˜ ì´ëŸ°ì½”ë“œëŠ” ì•„ë‹ˆì˜€ëŠ”ë°, ì¢€ ë” í™•ì—°í•œ ì°¨ì´ë¥¼ ë³´ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ì‚´ì§ ìˆ˜ì •í–ˆë‹¤.
function calcDiscount(price, coupon){
  let totalPrice = null;
  if(coupon){
    if(coupon.type === 'rate'){
      totalPrice = price - ((coupon.discountRate/100)*price);
    }else if(coupon.type === 'amount'){
      totalPrice = price - coupon.discountAmount;
    }
  }else{
    totalPrice = price;
  }
  return totalPrice;
}

// ë³€ê²½ í›„
function calcDiscount(price, coupon){
  if(!coupon) return price;
  if(coupon.type === 'rate') return price - ((coupon.discountRate/100)*price);
  if(coupon.type === 'amount') return price - coupon.discountAmount;  
}
  • ì¡°ê±´ë¬¸ ë‚´ë¶€ì— ì¡°ê±´ë¬¸ì´ ë” ìˆëŠ”ê²ƒì€, ë§¤ìš° ê°€ë…ì„±ì´ ë–¨ì–´ì§€ëŠ” í”„ë¡œê·¸ë˜ë°ì´ë¼ê³  í•œë‹¤.
  • ë“¤ì—¬ì“°ê¸°ê°€ ë§ì„ìˆ˜ë¡ ì§€ì €ë¶„í•œ ì½”ë“œë¼ê³  í•¨..
  • ë”°ë¼ì„œ, ì¡°ê¸°ì— returnì„ ì‹œì¼œì„œ ì¡°ê±´ë¬¸ì„ íƒˆì¶œí•˜ëŠ”ê²ƒì´ ì¢‹ë‹¤ê³  í•œë‹¤.
  • ì¡°ê¸°ì— returnì„ ì‹œí‚¤ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì—, ì¡°ê±´ë¬¸ì˜ ìœ„ì¹˜ê°€ ë§¤ìš° ì¤‘ìš”!
  • ì‚¼í•­ì—°ì‚°ìë¥¼ ìì£¼ì“°ëŠ”í¸ì¸ë°, ì•ˆì“°ëŠ”ê²Œ ì¢‹ë‹¤ê³  í•¨.. ë§¤ìš°ì¶©ê²©

ê¸°ëŠ¥ì— ë”°ë¼ì„œ, ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë¥¼ ì¢€ ë” ë‚˜ëˆŒ ìˆ˜ ìˆì—ˆë‹¤.

ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ì˜ ì—­í• ê³¼ ì±…ì„ì— ëŒ€í•´ ì¢€ ë” ê³ ë ¤í•´ë³´ê¸°.

  • ì´ì „ê¹Œì§€ëŠ” ë‚´ê°€ Reduxë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•¨ì— ìˆì–´, ë‚˜ëŠ” ë‹¨ìˆœíˆ Fluxë””ìì¸íŒ¨í„´ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤ê³  ìƒê°í–ˆë‹¤. í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ì´ë²ˆì— ì •ë§ ë‚˜ì˜ ì˜ëª»ëœ ìƒê°ì´ë¼ëŠ”ê²ƒì„ ëŠë¼ê²Œë˜ì—ˆë‹¤..

  • ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ìƒíƒœê°’ì„ ì¡°íšŒí•˜ê±°ë‚˜, ìƒíƒœê°’ì— ë³€í™”ë¥¼ ì£¼ëŠ” ë””ìŠ¤íŒ¨ì³ë¥¼ ê´€ë¦¬í•˜ëŠ” ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ì´ë‹¤. ì¦‰, ë¹„ì¦ˆë‹ˆìŠ¤ ë¡œì§ê³¼ ê´€ë ¨ëœ ê²ƒì„ ê´€ë¦¬í•˜ëŠ” ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë¼ ë³¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

í”„ë¦¬ì  í…Œì´ì…”ë„ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸

  • ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ì—ì„œ ë§Œë“  ë””ìŠ¤íŒ¨ì³ì™€ ìƒíƒœê°’ë“¤ì„ ì†ì„±ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œ ë°›ì•„, ë‹¨ìˆœì´ ë·°í™”ë©´ë§Œ ê·¸ë ¤ì£¼ëŠ” ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ì´ë‹¤.

  • ìƒíƒœê°’ì— ì¡°íšŒí• ìˆ˜ ì—†ì„ë¿ì´ì§€, UIë¥¼ êµ¬ì„±í•˜ëŠ” ë©”ì†Œë“œë“¤ì€ ì‚¬ìš©ì´ ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë‹¤.

    React Hookìœ¼ë¡œ, UIì™€ ê´€ë ¨ë˜ì—ˆì„ ê²½ìš° ìì‹ ë§Œì˜ ìƒíƒœê°’ì„ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆì„ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

// ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ HomeContainer.js
function HomeContainer(){
  const {hotItems, cart} = SetHotItmes();
  const dispatch = useDispatch();
  const insertCart = useCallback((data) => {
    dispatch(Actions.insertCart(data))
  }, [dispatch])
  const deleteCart = useCallback((id) => {
    dispatch(Actions.deleteCart(id))
  }, [dispatch])
  return <Home 
            hotItems={hotItems} 
            cart={cart}
            insertCart={insertCart}
            deleteCart={deleteCart}
          />;
}

function SetHotItmes(){
  const 
    {data : {productItems}, cart} = useSelector((state) => ({
      data : state.data,
      cart : state.cart
    }), (left, right) => {
      // Appì—ì„œë„ ê°™ì€ ë¶€ë¶„ì´ë¯€ë¡œ í•˜ë‚˜ë¡œ í•©ì¹ í•„ìš” ìˆìŒ.
      const leftString = Object.entries(left.cart).toString();
      const rightString = Object.entries(right.cart).toString();
      if(leftString !== rightString) return false;
      return true;
    });
  
  const hotItems = [...productItems].splice(0,3);

  return {hotItems, cart};
}

// í™ˆì€ appì—ê²Œ ìƒì†ë°›ëŠ” propsê°’ì´ ì—†ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì—, ì´í›„ì—ëŠ” appìœ¼ë¡œ ì¸í•œ ë Œë”ë§ì´ í•„ìš” ì—†ìŒ
export default React.memo(HomeContainer, () => true);

// í”„ë¦¬ì  í…Œì´ì…”ë„ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ Home.js
function Home({hotItems, insertCart, deleteCart, cart}){
  return(
    <div className="home routeComp">
      <div className="section">
        <div className="sectionTitle">ì¸ê¸°ê°•ì˜ TOP3</div>
        <div className="hotItems sectionContent">
          {
            hotItems.map((item, index) => {
              return(
                <ProductsItem 
                  data={item} 
                  id={item.id}
                  key={item.id+index}
                  cart={cart}
                  insertCart={insertCart}
                  deleteCart={deleteCart}
                />
              )
            })
          }
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  )
};

export default Home;
  • ìƒê°í•´ë³´ë„¤ ì˜ˆì „ì— Classë¡œ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ ë•Œ, connectë¡œ ë¦¬ë•ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í–ˆì—ˆëŠ”ë°, ê·¸ë•Œ ê·¸ ì—­í• ì´ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸í™”í•˜ëŠ”ê±°ì˜€ë‹¤.

  • ë°ì´í„° ì…ë ¥(Enqueue), ë°ì´í„° ì¶œë ¥(Dequeue) ë‘ê°€ì§€ ì‘ì—…ì´ ìˆë‹¤.

ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ë£¨í”„ì˜ Queue

ë°°ì—´ì˜ Shiftì™€ Push

  • ìë°”ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ì—ì„œëŠ” Queueë¼ëŠ” ìë£Œêµ¬ì¡°ê°€ ë°°ì—´ì²˜ëŸ¼ ìˆì§€ëŠ” ì•Šì§€ë§Œ, ë°°ì—´ì˜ ì…ë ¥ pushì™€ ì²«ë²ˆì§¸ ì¸ì ì¶œë ¥ì¸ shiftë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ë©´ ì‰½ê²Œ êµ¬í˜„ì´ ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë‹¤.
  • ë‹¨, pushëŠ” ê·¸ëƒ¥ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ëŠ”ê²ƒì´ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— O(1)ì˜ ì‹œê°„ë³µì§‘ë„ì§€ë§Œ, shiftëŠ” ì•ì˜ ê°’ì„ ì œê±°í•˜ê³ , í•˜ë‚˜í•˜ë‚˜ indexë¥¼ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì¡°ì •í•´ì¤˜ì•¼í•˜ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì—, O(n)ì˜ ì‹œê°„ë³µì¡ë„ë¥¼ ê°€ì§€ê³ ìˆë‹¤.
class Queue {
  constructor(){
    this.store = [];
  }

  enqueue(item){
    this.store.push(item);
  }

  dequeue(){
    return this.store.shift();
  }
}

const queue = new Queue();
queue.enqueue('ì¹˜í‚¨'); 
console.log(queue.store)
queue.enqueue('í”¼ì');
console.log(queue.store)
console.log(queue.dequeue());

ì´ì¤‘ì—°ê²°ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ë¥¼ í™œìš©í•œ Queue

  • pushë‚˜ shiftë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ”, ì„ ì…ì„ ì¶œ ë°©ì‹ì˜ ë°ì´í„°êµ¬ì¡°
  • í•˜ë‚˜í•˜ë‚˜ ìˆœíšŒí•˜ë©° indexë¥¼ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì¡ì•„ì£¼ëŠ” shiftë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì§€ ì•Šì•„, ì‹œê°„ë³µì¡ë„ì—ìˆì–´ì„œ ë” íš¨ìœ¨ì ì´ë‹¤. O(1)
class Node {
  constructor(value){
    this.value = value;
    this.next = null;
    this.prev = null;
  }
}
class Queue {
  constructor(){
    this.first = null;
    this.last = null;
    this.size = 0;
  }

  enqueue(value){
    const newNode = new Node(value);
    if(this.size === 0){
      this.first = newNode;
      this.last = newNode;
    }else{
      newNode.prev = this.last;
      this.last.next = newNode;
      this.last = newNode;
    }
    this.size++;
    return this;
  }

  dequeue(vlaue){
    if(this.size===0){
      return this;
    }else{
      this.first.next.prev = null;
      this.first = this.first.next;
    }
    this.size--;
    return this;
  }
}

const queue = new Queue();
queue.enqueue(1)
queue.enqueue(2)
queue.enqueue(3)
queue.enqueue(4)
console.log(queue)
queue.dequeue(4)
console.log(queue)

  • ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ë…¸ë“œê°€ ì‹œì‘ë¶€ë¶„ì— ì¶”ê°€ëœë‹¤ë©´, ê¸°ì¡´ì˜ Headê°€ ë˜ëŠ” ë…¸ë“œëŠ” ë’¤ë¡œ ë°€ë¦¬ê³ , ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ë…¸ë“œê°€ Headë…¸ë“œê°€ ëœë‹¤. ê·¸ë¦¬ê³ , ìƒˆë¡­ê²Œ Headê°€ ëœ ë…¸ë“œëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒ ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ì´ì „ì˜ Headë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¨ë‹¤.

ë°ì´í„° ì¤‘ê°„ë¶€ë¶„ì— ì¶”ê°€

  • ì‹œì‘ì´ë˜ëŠ” ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ì°¾ëŠ”ë‹¤.
  • ì›í•˜ëŠ” ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ë²ˆì§¸ì˜ ê°’ì„ ì°¾ì•„ê°„ë‹¤.
  • í•´ë‹¹ ê°’ì„ ì°¾ìœ¼ë©´, ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ê³  ê¸°ì¡´ì—ìˆë˜ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë‹¤ìŒ ë…¸ë“œë¡œ ì¡ëŠ”ë‹¤.
  • ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ë°ì´í„° ì•ì˜ ë…¸ë“œëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒ ë…¸ë“œë¡œ ìƒˆë¡­ê²Œ ì¶”ê°€ëœ ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ì¡ëŠ”ë‹¤.

  • ì‚­ì œí•  ë…¸ë“œì˜ ë‹¤ìŒë…¸ë“œë¥¼ curì˜ ë‹¤ìŒë…¸ë“œë¡œ ë³€ê²½í•˜ê³ , ì‚­ì œí•  ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ deleteë¡œ ì§€ì›Œì¤€ë‹¤.

Doubly LinkedList ì´ì¤‘ì—°ê²°ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸

  • ê¸°ì¡´ LinkedListì™€ ë‹¤ë¥´ê²Œ, ë‹¤ìŒì˜ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ìœ„ì¹˜ë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” ë³€ìˆ˜ ë¿ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼, ì´ì „ì˜ ë…¸ë“œë˜í•œ ì°¾ì„ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” ë³€ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ê°€ì§€ê³ ìˆë‹¤.

ì¥ì 

  • LinkedListì˜ ë°ì´í„° ì¡°íšŒë¥¼ ì¢€ ë” íš¨ìœ¨ì ìœ¼ë¡œí•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤ëŠ” ì ì¸ë°, ì•ì˜ ë…¸ë“œë˜í•œ ì¡°íšŒí•  ìˆ˜ ìˆê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ì´ ë°ì´í„°ì˜ ì‚¬ì´ì¦ˆë¥¼ í†µí•´ ë§Œì•½ ì°¾ê³ ìí•˜ëŠ” ë…¸ë“œì˜ ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ê°€ ì‚¬ì´ì¦ˆì˜ ì ˆë°˜ë³´ë‹¤ í¬ë‹¤ë©´, ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ì—ì„œë¶€í„° ì•ì˜ ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ì°¾ëŠ” ë“± í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

ë°ì´í„° ì¶”ê°€, ì œê±°

  • LinkedListì™€ ë™ì¼í•˜ì§€ë§Œ, nextë¿ë§Œ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼ previousë˜í•œ ì§€ì •í•´ì£¼ì–´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.

JavaScriptë¡œ ì´ì¤‘ì—°ê²°ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ êµ¬í˜„

  • ì´ê²Œ ë§ëŠ”ì§€ëŠ” ëª¨ë¥´ê² ë‹¤.
  • ê·¸ëƒ¥ LinkedListì˜ ê²½ìš°, prevë§Œ ì—†ì–´ì§€ë©´ ëœë‹¤.
  • ìë°”ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ì˜ ê²½ìš°, spliceë¡œ ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì˜ ë™ì ì¸ ì…ë ¥ ì‚­ì œê°€ ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ì§€ë§Œ, ì‹œê°„ë³µì¡ë„ì˜ ê²½ìš° O(n)ì´ë¯€ë¡œ ì§ì ‘êµ¬í˜„í•œ ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ë³´ë‹¤ ë¹„íš¨ìœ¨ì ì´ë¼ê³  í•œë‹¤.
class LinkedList {
constructor(value){
  this.head = {
    value : value,
    next : null,
    prev : null,
  }
  this.tail = this.head;
  this.cur = this.head;
  this.length = 1;
}

append(value){
  const newNode = {
    value : value,
    next : null,
    prev : this.tail
  }
  this.tail.next = newNode;
  this.tail = newNode;
  this.length++;
}

preAppend(value){
  const newNode = {
    value : value,
    next : this.head,
    prev : null
  }
  this.head.prev = newNode;
  this.head = newNode;
  this.length++;
}

shift(){
  this.head = this.head.next;
  this.head.prev = null;
  this.length--;
}

pop(){
  this.tail = this.tail.prev;
  this.tail.next = null;
  this.length--;
}

insert(index, value){
  this.cur = this.head;
  if(index >= this.length){
    this.append(value);
  }else if(index === 0){
    this.prAppend(value);
  }else{
    let count = 1;
    while(count !== index){
      this.cur = this.cur.next;
      count++;
    }
    const newNode = {
      value : value,
      prev : this.cur,
      next : this.cur.next
    }
    this.cur.next = newNode;
    newNode.next.prev = newNode;
    this.length++;
  }
}

delete(index){
  const half = Math.ceil(this.length/2);
  if(index === 0){
    this.shift()
  }else if(index === this.length-1){
    this.pop()
  }else{
    if(index <= half){
      this.cur = this.head;
      let count = 1;
      while(count !== index){
        this.cur = this.cur.next;
        count++;
      }
      this.cur.next = this.cur.next.next;
      this.cur.next.prev = this.cur;
    }else{
      this.cur = this.tail;
      let count = this.length;
      while(count !== index){
        this.cur = this.cur.prev;
        count--;
      }
      this.cur.next = this.cur.next.next;
      this.cur.next.prev = this.cur;
    }
    this.length--;
  }
}

getArray(){
  this.cur = this.head;
  let 
    count = 0,
    array = [];
  while(count !== this.length){
    array.push(this.cur.value);
    this.cur = this.cur.next;
    count++;
  }
  return array;
}
}

linkedList = new LinkedList(1);
linkedList.append(2)
linkedList.append(4)
linkedList.append(5)
linkedList.append(6)
linkedList.insert(2,3)
linkedList.append(7)
linkedList.delete(2)
console.log(linkedList)

// push

// length

// unShift

const arrayShift = [1,2,3];

// concat

//  ê¸°ì¡´ì˜ ë°°ì—´ì„ ë°”ê¾¸ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ”ë‹¤.
const arrayConcat = [1,2,3];

// join

// sort

// slice

class ScopeManager {
    private val mainScope = CoroutineScope(Dispatchers.Default)
    fun destroy(){

    suspend fun HttpRequest(_val : String) : SendingData {

        val httpResult = getHttp(editTextVal)

        return mainScope.async {
            val userEquipResult = getUserEquip(httpResult)
            val userInfoResult = getUserInfo(httpResult, _val)

            SendingData(userEquipResult, userInfoResult)

item.title: Kotlin Coroutine Suspending
item.description: Coroutine Suspending ì˜ˆì œ ì˜ˆì œ1 ì„œë¡œ ì˜ì¡´ì„±ìˆëŠ” ë©”ì†Œë“œì¼ ë•Œ ì½”ë£¨í‹´ ë‚´ë¶€ì—ì„œ ì¤‘ë‹¨ë©”ì†Œë“œë¥¼ í™œìš©í•˜ë©´ ê¿ˆì˜ ì½”ë“œì²˜ëŸ¼ ìˆœì°¨ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‘ë™ëœë‹¤. ì˜ˆì œ2 ì˜ˆì œâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Coroutine Suspending ì˜ˆì œ

ì˜ˆì œ1

fun main() = runBlocking {
//    ì˜ˆì œ1
//      ì„œë¡œ ì˜ì¡´ì„±ìˆëŠ” ë©”ì†Œë“œì¼ ë•Œ
//      ì½”ë£¨í‹´ ë‚´ë¶€ì—ì„œ ì¤‘ë‹¨ë©”ì†Œë“œë¥¼ í™œìš©í•˜ë©´ ê¿ˆì˜ ì½”ë“œì²˜ëŸ¼ ìˆœì°¨ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‘ë™ëœë‹¤.
    var one = 0
    var two = 0
    val time = measureTimeMillis {
        one = doSomethingUsefulOne() // ì²«ë²ˆì§¸ ì¤‘ë‹¨
        two = doSomethingUsefulTwo(one) // ë‘ë²ˆì§¸ ì¤‘ë‹¨
        println("The answer is ${one+two}")
    }
    println("Completed in $time ms")
}

suspend fun doSomethingUsefulTwo(_one : Int): Int {
    delay(1000)
    return _one+13
}

suspend fun doSomethingUsefulOne(): Int {
    delay(1000)
    return 29
}

// The answer is 71
// Completed in 2010 ms
  • ì„œë¡œ ì˜ì¡´ì„±ìˆëŠ” ë©”ì†Œë“œì¼ ë•Œ ì½”ë£¨í‹´ ë‚´ë¶€ì—ì„œ ì¤‘ë‹¨ë©”ì†Œë“œë¥¼ í™œìš©í•˜ë©´ ê¿ˆì˜ ì½”ë“œì²˜ëŸ¼ ìˆœì°¨ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‘ë™ëœë‹¤.

ì˜ˆì œ2

fun main() = runBlocking {

        val two = async { doSomethingUsefulTwo() } // ë‘ë²ˆì§¸ ì¤‘ë‹¨
        println("The answer is ${one.await()+two.await()}")
    }
    println("Completed in $time ms")
}

suspend fun doSomethingUsefulTwo(): Int {
    delay(1000)
    return 13
}

suspend fun doSomethingUsefulOne(): Int {
    delay(1000)
    return 29
}

// The answer is 42
// Completed in 1026 ms
  • ì˜ˆì œ 1ê³¼ ë™ì¼í•˜ê²Œ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ ë‚´ë¶€ì—ì„œ ì¤‘ë‹¨í•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ìˆê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ë©”ì¸ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œë¥¼ ì½ëŠ”ê²ƒì€ ì¤‘ë‹¨í•˜ê¸´ í•˜ì§€ë§Œ, ì„œë¡œ ì—°ê´€ë˜ì–´ìˆì§€ ì•Šê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ê°ê¸° ë™ì‹œì— ì‹¤í–‰ì‹œí‚¤ê³  ê²°ê³¼ê°’ë§Œ ê¸°ë‹¤ë¦¼
  • launch ë¹Œë”ëŠ” job í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ë°˜í™˜í•˜ì§€ë§Œ, asyncëŠ” jobì—ê²Œ ìƒì†ë°›ëŠ” deferredí´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ë°˜í™˜ë°›ìŒìŒ ë”°ë¼ì„œ cancel, join ëª¨ë‘ ì‚¬ìš©ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ì§€ë§Œ awaitì´ë¼ëŠ”ê²Œ ìƒê¹€

ì˜ˆì œ3

fun main() = runBlocking {
    val time = measureTimeMillis {
        val one = async(start = CoroutineStart.LAZY) { doSomethingUsefulOne() } // ì²«ë²ˆì§¸ ì¤‘ë‹¨
        val two = async(start = CoroutineStart.LAZY) { doSomethingUsefulTwo() } // ë‘ë²ˆì§¸ ì¤‘ë‹¨
        one.start()
        two.start()
        println("The answer is ${one.await()+two.await()}")
    }
    println("Completed in $time ms")
}

suspend fun doSomethingUsefulTwo(): Int {
    delay(1000)
    return 13
}

suspend fun doSomethingUsefulOne(): Int {
    delay(1000)
    return 29
}

// The answer is 42
// Completed in 1017 ms
  • ê¸°ì¡´ asyncë§Œ ìˆì—ˆì„ ê²½ìš°, async êµ¬ë¬¸ì´ ì½íˆìë§ˆì í•´ë‹¹ ì½”ë£¨í‹´ì´ ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ì§€ë§Œ, ì•„ë˜ì™€ê°™ì´ ë³€ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë³´ë‚´ì£¼ê²Œë˜ë©´ ë°”ë¡œì‹¤í–‰ì‹œí‚¤ì§€ì•Šê³  ì´í›„ startë‚˜ await ë©”ì†Œë“œë¡œ í˜¸ì¶œí• ë•Œ ì‹¤í–‰ëœë‹¤.

ì˜ˆì œ4

fun main() = runBlocking<Unit> {
   try {
       failedConcurrentSum()
   } catch (e : ArithmeticException) {
       println("Computation failed with ArithmetickException")
   }
}

suspend fun failedConcurrentSum() : Int = coroutineScope {
   val one = async {
       try {
           delay(Long.MAX_VALUE)
           42
       } finally {
           println("First child was cancelled")
       }
   }
   val two = async<Int> {
       println("Second child throws an exception")
       throw ArithmeticException()
   }
   one.await() + two.await()
}

// Second child throws an exception
// First child was cancelled
// Computation failed with ArithmetickException

Coroutine Cancellation & Timeouts ì˜ˆì œ

  • ì½”ë£¨í‹´ì„ í™œìš©í•˜ì—¬ ë¹„ë™ê¸° ì²˜ë¦¬ë¥¼ í•  ë•Œ, ë¶ˆí•„ìš”í•˜ê²Œ ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ê°€ ì†Œëª¨ë˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì„ ë§‰ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ì§„í–‰ ì·¨ì†Œ ë˜í•œ ë§¤ìš° ì¤‘ìš”í•˜ë‹¤.

    ì˜ˆì œ1

fun main() = runBlocking {
   val job = launch {
       repeat(1000) { i ->
           println("job : I'm sleeping $i ...")
           delay(500)
       }
   }
   delay(1300)
   println("main : I'm tired of waiting!")
   job.cancel()
   println("main : Now I can quit.")
}
// job : I'm sleeping 0 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 1 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 2 ...
// main : I'm tired of waiting!
// main : Now I can quit.
  • ìƒì„±ë˜ëŠ” ì½”ë£¨í‹´ì„ ë³€ìˆ˜ì— ë‹´ê³ , cancelë©”ì†Œë“œë¥¼ í†µí•´ í•´ë‹¹ ì½”ë£¨í‹´ì„ ì¤‘ë‹¨ì‹œí‚¬ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

ì˜ˆì œ2

fun main() = runBlocking {
//      ìœ„ì˜ ì—ì œì—ì„œëŠ” ì½”ë£¨í‹´ ë‚´ë¶€ì— delayë¼ëŠ” suspendí•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ì¡´ì¬í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ì˜ˆì œ2ëŠ” ì—†ìŒ
   val startTime = System.currentTimeMillis()
   val job = launch(Dispatchers.Default) {
       var nextPrintTime = startTime
       var i = 0
       while(i < 5) {
            // í˜„ì¬ ë°€ë¦¬ì´ˆê°€ ì´ˆê¸°ê°’ë³´ë‹¤ í¬ë‹¤ë©´ ì§„í–‰í•˜ê³ , ì´ˆê¸°ê°’ì— 0.5ì´ˆ ë”í•´ì¤Œ
            // í˜„ì¬ ë°€ë¦¬ì´ˆê°€ ì´ˆê¸°ê°’ë³´ë‹¤ ë” ì‘ë‹¤ê°€ ì‹œê°„ì´ íë¥´ë©´ ì´ˆê¸°ê°’ë³´ë‹¤ ì»¤ì ¸ì„œ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì§„í–‰
            // ì¦‰, 0.5ì´ˆë§ˆë‹¤ ë°˜ë³µì´ ë¨
           if(System.currentTimeMillis() >= nextPrintTime) {
               println("job : I'm sleeping ${i++} ...")
               nextPrintTime += 500
           }
       }
   }
   delay(1300)
   println("main : I'm tired of waiting!")
   job.cancelAndJoin()
   println("main : Now I can quit.")
}

// job : I'm sleeping 0 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 1 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 2 ...
// main : I'm tired of waiting!
// job : I'm sleeping 3 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 4 ...
// main : Now I can quit.
  • ìœ„ì˜ ì˜ˆì œ1ê³¼ ë¹„ìŠ·í•˜ê²Œ ì½”ë£¨í‹´ì„ ì‘ë™ì„ ì¤‘ë‹¨ì‹œì¼°ì§€ë§Œ, 1.3ì´ˆ ì´í›„ì—ë„ 4, 5ë¼ëŠ” ëª¨ë“  ê²°ê³¼ê°’ì„ ì§„í–‰í•˜ê³  ì¢…ë£Œë¨.
  • ìœ„ì˜ ì—ì œì—ì„œëŠ” ì½”ë£¨í‹´ ë‚´ë¶€ì— delayë¼ëŠ” suspendí•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ì¡´ì¬í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ì˜ˆì œ2ëŠ” ì—†ìŒ
  • í•´ë‹¹ threadì—ì„œ ì½”ë£¨í‹´ì„ ì¤‘ë‹¨ì‹œí‚¤ë”ë¼ë„, ì½”ë£¨í‹´ ë‚´ë¶€ì—ì„œ í˜‘ì¡°ì ì´ì§€ ì•Šìœ¼ë©´(suspendí•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ì—†ë‹¤ë©´) ëª¨ë“  ê²°ê³¼ë¥¼ ë³´ì—¬ì£¼ê³  ì¢…ë£Œëœë‹¤

ì˜ˆì œ2-1

fun main() = runBlocking {
    val startTime = System.currentTimeMillis()
    val job = launch(Dispatchers.Default) {
        try {
            var nextPrintTime = startTime
            var i = 0
            while(i < 5) {
                if(System.currentTimeMillis() >= nextPrintTime) {
                    yield()
                    println("job : I'm sleeping ${i++} ...")
                    nextPrintTime += 500
                }
            }
        }catch (e : Exception) {
            println("Suspended by $e")
        }
    }
    delay(1300)
    println("main : I'm tired of waiting!")
    job.cancelAndJoin()
    println("main : Now I can quit.")
}

// job : I'm sleeping 0 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 1 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 2 ...
// main : I'm tired of waiting!
// Suspended by kotlinx.coroutines.JobCancellationException: StandaloneCoroutine was cancelled; job=StandaloneCoroutine{Cancelling}@4f591ba8
// main : Now I can quit.
  • ì½”ë£¨í‹´ ë‚´ë¶€ì—ì„œë„ delayë¡œ ì‹œê°„ì„ ë¶€ì—¬í•˜ì—¬ ì¤‘ë‹¨ì´ ì•„ë‹Œ yield()ë¥¼ í†µí•´ ë©”ì¸ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ ì¤‘ë‹¨ì„ ìš”ì²­í–ˆì„ ë•Œ, ì¦‰ì‹œ ì¤‘ë‹¨ ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë‹¤.
  • ë‹¨, yield()ë¥¼ í†µí•´ ì¤‘ë‹¨í–ˆì„ ë•Œ ì¤‘ë‹¨ ì‚¬ìœ ë¥¼ ì•Œ ìˆ˜ ì—†ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— try catch êµ¬ë¬¸ì„ í†µí•´ catchì˜ e ì¸ìë¡œ í™•ì¸í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.
  • í•´ë‹¹ threadì—ì„œ ì½”ë£¨í‹´ì„ ì¤‘ë‹¨ì‹œí‚¤ë”ë¼ë„, ì½”ë£¨í‹´ ë‚´ë¶€ì—ì„œ í˜‘ì¡°ì ì´ì§€ ì•Šìœ¼ë©´(suspendí•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ì—†ë‹¤ë©´) ëª¨ë“  ê²°ê³¼ë¥¼ ë³´ì—¬ì£¼ê³  ì¢…ë£Œëœë‹¤

ì˜ˆì œ2-2

fun main() = runBlocking {
    val startTime = System.currentTimeMillis()
    val job = launch(Dispatchers.Default) {
        var nextPrintTime = startTime
        var i = 0
        while(isActive) {
            if(System.currentTimeMillis() >= nextPrintTime) {
                yield()
                println("job : I'm sleeping ${i++} ...")
                nextPrintTime += 500
            }
        }
    }
    delay(1300)
    println("main : I'm tired of waiting!")
    job.cancelAndJoin()
    println("main : Now I can quit.")
}

// job : I'm sleeping 0 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 1 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 2 ...
// main : I'm tired of waiting!
// main : Now I can quit.
  • ì¡°ê±´ì— isActiveë¥¼ í†µí•´ suspendí•¨ìˆ˜ ì—†ì´ë„ ì¤‘ë‹¨ì‹œí‚¬ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

ì˜ˆì œ3

fun main() = runBlocking {
    val job = launch {
        try {
            repeat(1000) { i ->
                println("job : I'm sleeping $i ...")
                delay(500)
            }
        } finally {
            println("job : I'm running finally")
        }
    }
    delay(1300)
    println("main : I'm tired of waiting!")
    job.cancelAndJoin()
    println("main : Now I can quit.")
}

// job : I'm sleeping 0 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 1 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 2 ...
// main : I'm tired of waiting!
// job : I'm running finally
// main : Now I can quit.
  • ë„¤íŠ¸ì›Œí¬ ì˜¤ë¥˜ ë“± ì½”ë£¨í‹´ ì§„í–‰ì´ ì¤‘ë‹¨ë˜ì—ˆì„ ë•Œ, finally ë‚´ë¶€ì—ì„œ ì¤‘ë‹¨ ì´í›„ ì²˜ë¦¬ë¥¼ í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

ì˜ˆì œ4

fun main() = runBlocking {
    val job = launch {
        try {
            repeat(1000) { i ->
                println("job : I'm sleeping $i ...")
                delay(500)
            }
        } finally {
            withContext(NonCancellable) {
                println("job : I'm running finally")
                delay(1000)
                println("job : And I've just delayed for 1 sec because I'm non-cancellable")
            }
        }
    }
    delay(1300)
    println("main : I'm tired of waiting!")
    job.cancelAndJoin()
    println("main : Now I can quit.")
}

// job : I'm sleeping 0 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 1 ...
// job : I'm sleeping 2 ...
// main : I'm tired of waiting!
// job : I'm running finally
// job : And I've just delayed for 1 sec because I'm non-cancellable
// main : Now I can quit.
  • ì½”ë£¨í‹´ì´ ì¤‘ë‹¨ëœ ì‹œì ì— ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì½”ë£¨í‹´ì„ í•œë²ˆ ë” ì‘ë™ì‹œí‚¤ê³ ì í•  ê²½ìš°

ì˜ˆì œ5

fun main() = runBlocking {
    val result = withTimeoutOrNull(1300) {
        repeat(1000) { i ->
            println("I'm sleeping $i ...")
            delay(500)
        }
        "Done"
    }
    println("Result is $result")
}

// I'm sleeping 0 ...
// I'm sleeping 1 ...
// I'm sleeping 2 ...
// Result is null

ì •ë¦¬

  • runBlocking = ìì‹ ì½”ë£¨í‹´(ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ)ë“¤ì´ ëª¨ë‘ ì™„ë£Œë ë•Œê¹Œì§€ í˜„ì¬ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œê°€ ì¢…ë£Œë˜ëŠ”ê²ƒì„ ë¯¸ë£¸
  • launch = ìœ„ì—ì„œ ìˆœì°¨ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì½ì–´ì˜¤ë©´ì„œ í•´ë‹¹ launch ì½”ë£¨í‹´ì´ ìˆë‹¤ë©´ ì™¸ë¶€ ì‹ ê²½ì“°ì§€ë§ê³  ê·¸ëƒ¥ ì‹¤í–‰ì‹œí‚´ íŠ¹ë³„í•œ ëª…ë ¹ ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ ë©ˆì¶”ì§€ì•ŠìŒ
  • suspend = ì½”ë£¨í‹´(ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ)ë‚´ë¶€ì—ì„œ suspendí•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë§Œë‚˜ëŠ” ìˆœê°„ í•´ë‹¹ ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œë¥¼ ì½ëŠ”ê²ƒì„ ì¤‘ì§€í•˜ê³  ê·¸ suspendí•¨ìˆ˜ë¨¼ì € ì‹¤í–‰ì‹œí‚¨ë‹¤ìŒ suspendí•¨ìˆ˜ ì™„ë£Œë˜ë©´ ë‹¤ìŒêº¼ ì½ìŒ

item.title: Kotlin Fragment
item.description: Fragment Activityê°„ í™”ë©´ ì „í™˜ì´ ì•„ë‹Œ, ë¶€í’ˆë§Œ êµì²´í•˜ì—¬ í™”ë©´ì„ êµ¬ì„±í• ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ì—”ë“œ í”„ë ˆì„ì›Œí¬ì—ì„œ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ì™€ ë¹„ìŠ·í•œ ê¸°ëŠ¥ ê°™ë‹¤. ê²°ê³¼ë¬¼ ì°¸ì¡° í™ìŠ¤ë¡œì´ë“œ Kotlin Fragment
item.content:encoded:
Fragment

  • Activityê°„ í™”ë©´ ì „í™˜ì´ ì•„ë‹Œ, ë¶€í’ˆë§Œ êµì²´í•˜ì—¬ í™”ë©´ì„ êµ¬ì„±í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

    í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ì—”ë“œ í”„ë ˆì„ì›Œí¬ì—ì„œ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ì™€ ë¹„ìŠ·í•œ ê¸°ëŠ¥ ê°™ë‹¤.

// MainActivity.kt
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        setFrag(0)

        btn_fragment1.setOnClickListener {
            setFrag(0)
        }
        btn_fragment2.setOnClickListener {
            setFrag(1)
        }
        btn_fragment3.setOnClickListener {
            setFrag(2)
        }
    }

    private fun setFrag(fragNum : Int) {
        // Fragment ì—°ê²°
        val ft = supportFragmentManager.beginTransaction()
        when(fragNum){
            0 -> {
                ft.replace(R.id.main_frame, Fragment1()).commit()
            }
            1 -> {
                ft.replace(R.id.main_frame, Fragment2()).commit()
            }
            2 -> {
                ft.replace(R.id.main_frame, Fragment3()).commit()
            }
        }
    }
}

// activity_main.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
        android:id="@+id/rv_recyclerView"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

// char_list.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="vertical"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:orientation="horizontal"
        android:layout_margin="16dp">
        <Button
            android:id="@+id/btn_fragment1"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_weight="1"
            android:text="Fragment1"/>
        <Button
            android:id="@+id/btn_fragment2"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_weight="1"
            android:text="Fragment2"/>
        <Button
            android:id="@+id/btn_fragment3"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_weight="1"
            android:text="Fragment3"/>
    </LinearLayout>
    <FrameLayout
        android:id="@+id/main_frame"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        android:layout_margin="16dp"/>
</LinearLayout>

// Fragement1, 2, 3.kt
class Fragment1 : Fragment() {
    override fun onCreateView( // Fragment ì²« ì‹¤í–‰ì‹œ ìˆ˜í–‰
        inflater: LayoutInflater,
        container: ViewGroup?,
        savedInstanceState: Bundle?
    ): View? {
        // frag.xml ì—°ê²° (1,2,3)
        val view = inflater.inflate(R.layout.frag1, container, false)
        return view
    }
}

Recycler View

  • ê¸°ì¡´ List Viewë³´ë‹¤ ì¢€ ë” ê°œì„ ëœ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì´ë‹¤.
// MainActivity.kt
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    val url = "https://cdn-lostark.game.onstove.com/2018/obt/assets/images/pc/information/class/"
    val GameCharList = arrayListOf<Char>(
        Char("${url}img_detail_warlord_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Warrior", "Warlord"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_berserker_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Warrior", "Berserker"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_destroyer_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Warrior", "Destroyer"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_holyknight_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Warrior", "Holyknight"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_battlemaster_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Fighter", "Battle Master"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_infighter_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Fighter", "Infighter"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_soulmaster_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Fighter", "Soul Master"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_lancemaster_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Fighter", "Lance Master"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_devilhunter_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Hunter", "Devil Hunter"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_blaster_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Hunter", "Blaster"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_hawkeye_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Hunter", "Hawk Eye"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_scouter_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Hunter", "Scouter"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_bard_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Magician", "Bard"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_summoner_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Magician", "Summoner"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_arcana_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Magician", "Arcana"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_blade_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Assassin", "Blade"),
        Char("${url}img_detail_demonic_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Assassin", "Demonic")
    )
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        // ìˆ˜ì§ìœ¼ë¡œ ìƒì„±
        // rv_recyclerView.layoutManager = LinearLayoutManager(this, LinearLayoutManager.VERTICAL, false)

        // ìˆ˜í‰ìœ¼ë¡œ ìƒì„±
        // rv_recyclerView.layoutManager = LinearLayoutManager(this, LinearLayoutManager.HORIZONTAL, false)

        // ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œë¡œ ìƒì„±
        rv_recyclerView.layoutManager = GridLayoutManager(this, 2)
        rv_recyclerView.setHasFixedSize(true) // recyclerView ì„±ëŠ¥ê°œì„ 

        rv_recyclerView.adapter = CharAdapter(GameCharList)
    }
}

// activity_main.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
        android:id="@+id/rv_recyclerView"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

// char_list.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content">

    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_marginStart="8dp"
        android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/iv_prifile"
            android:layout_width="60dp"
            android:layout_height="60dp"
            android:layout_marginStart="8dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
            android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
            app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
            tools:srcCompat="@tools:sample/avatars" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/tv_groupClass"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginStart="20dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
            android:text="GroupClass"
            android:textColor="#000000"
            android:textStyle="bold"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/iv_prifile"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/tv_detailClass"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginStart="20dp"
            android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
            android:text="DetailClass"
            android:textColor="#000000"
            app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/iv_prifile" />
    </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

// Char.kt
class Char (val profile : String, val groupClass : String, val detailClass : String)

// CharAdapter.kt
class CharAdapter(val charList : ArrayList<Char>) : RecyclerView.Adapter<CharAdapter.CustomViewHolder>(){
    override fun onCreateViewHolder(parent: ViewGroup, viewType: Int): CharAdapter.CustomViewHolder {
        // 1ë²ˆìˆœì„œ
        // Activityì—ì„œ onCreate, setContentViewë¥¼ í†µí•´ xmlì„ ì—°ê²°í•˜ëŠ”ê²ƒì²˜ëŸ¼
        // ì™„ì„±ëœ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒì´ ë“¤ì–´ê°€ê²Œë  Activityì— ë¯¸ë¦¬ ë§Œë“  ë¹„ì–´ìˆëŠ” ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒì„ ì—°ê²°í•œë‹¤.
        val view = LayoutInflater.from(parent.context).inflate(R.layout.char_list, parent, false)

        // í´ë¦­ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ë„ í•´ë‹¹ classì— ë¬¶ì–´ì„œ ë³´ëƒ„
        return CustomViewHolder(view, parent).apply {
            this.inflated_char_list.setOnClickListener {
                val curPos : Int = adapterPosition // í´ë¦­ ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì‹¤í–‰ì‹œì—ë§Œ ì œê³µë˜ëŠ” ê¸°ëŠ¥ì¸ë“¯í•¨
                val charData : Char = charList.get(curPos)
                Toast.makeText(parent.context, "ê·¸ë£¹ : ${charData.groupClass}\nì§ì—… : ${charData.detailClass}", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
            }
        }
    }

    override fun getItemCount(): Int {
        return charList.size
    }

    override fun onBindViewHolder(holder: CustomViewHolder, position: Int) {
        // 3ë²ˆìˆœì„œ
        // CustomViewHolderì—ê²Œ ìƒì†ë°›ì€ val ê°’ë“¤ì„ í†µí•´ ë°°ì—´ì˜ ë°ì´í„°ë“¤ì„ ì—°ê²°í•¨
        Glide.with(holder._parent).load(charList.get(position).profile).into(holder.profile)
        holder.groupClass.text = charList.get(position).groupClass
        holder.detailClass.text = charList.get(position).detailClass
    }

    class CustomViewHolder(val inflated_char_list : View, val _parent : ViewGroup) : RecyclerView.ViewHolder(inflated_char_list) {
        // 2ë²ˆìˆœì„œ
        // ë¹„ì–´ìˆëŠ” ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒë“¤ì—ì„œ ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ë“¤ì–´ê°€ì•¼í•  íƒœê·¸ë“¤ì˜ idë¥¼ í˜¸ì¶œ
        val profile = inflated_char_list.findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.iv_prifile) // ì´ë¯¸ì§€
        val groupClass = inflated_char_list.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.tv_groupClass) // ê·¸ë£¹í´ë˜ìŠ¤
        val detailClass = inflated_char_list.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.tv_detailClass) // ì„œë¸Œí´ë˜ìŠ¤ìŠ¤
   }
}

ê²°ê³¼ë¬¼

ì°¸ì¡°

í™ìŠ¤ë¡œì´ë“œ Kotlin Recycler View

item.title: Kotlin Camera
item.description: Cameraâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Camera

  • ì•ˆë“œë¡œì´ë“œ ê¸°ë³¸ ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ ì•±ì—ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

    ê°œì¸ì ìœ¼ë¡œ.. ìë°” ê¸°ë³¸ë¬¸ë²•ì„ ëª¨ë¥´ë‹¤ë³´ë‹ˆ ë„ˆë¬´ ì–´ë ¤ì› ë‹¤..íŠ¹íˆ ì¤‘ê°„ì¤‘ê°„ì— alsoê°™ì€ êµ¬ë¬¸ì´ ìˆë˜ë°.. ì ê¹ ì•Œì•„ë³´ë‹ˆ classì˜ ì†ì„±ë“¤ì„ ì¡°ê¸ˆ ë” ì‰½ê²Œ ë³€ê²½í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” ë¬¸ë²•ì¸ê²ƒê°™ë‹¤!.. ê³µë¶€í•´ì•¼í• ë“¯

// Manifest.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    package="com.example.camera">

    <!--  ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ê¶Œí•œ  -->
    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CAMERA"/>
    <!--  íŒŒì¼ ì“°ê¸° ê¶Œí•œ  -->
    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"/>
    <!--  íŒŒì¼ ì €ì¥ ê¶Œí•œ  -->
    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"/>
    <!--  ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ê¸°ëŠ¥ ì‚¬ìš©  -->
    <uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera" android:required="true"/>
    <!--  true : ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì´ ì—†ëŠ” ì•ˆë“œë¡œì´ë“œì¼ ê²½ìš°, ì—ëŸ¬ê°€ ìƒê¹€  -->
    <!--  false : ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì´ ì—†ì–´ë„ ì •ìƒì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‘ë™ë¨  -->

    <application
        android:allowBackup="true"
        android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
        android:label="@string/app_name"
        android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"
        android:supportsRtl="true"
        android:theme="@style/AppTheme">
        <activity android:name=".MainActivity">
            <intent-filter>
                <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />

                <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
            </intent-filter>
        </activity>

        <!--  ë³´ì•ˆì„ ìœ„í•´ ì‚¬ì§„ ì œê³µì, ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ì•±ì— ëŒ€í•œ ëª…ì‹œ  -->
        <provider
            android:authorities="com.example.camera.fileprovider"
            android:name="androidx.core.content.FileProvider"
            android:exported="false"
            android:grantUriPermissions="true">
            <meta-data android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS"
                android:resource="@xml/file_paths" />

        </provider>
    </application>

</manifest>

// MainActivity.kt
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    val REQUEST_IMAGE_CAPTURE = 1 // ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ì‚¬ì§„ì´¬ì˜ ìš”ì²­ì½”ë“œ
    lateinit var curPhotoPath : String // ê·¸ëƒ¥ ë¯¸ë¦¬ ì„ ì–¸í•´ë†“ëŠ” ë¬¸ìì—´ í˜•íƒœì˜ ì‚¬ì§„ ê²½ë¡œ

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        // mainfestsì— í•„ìš”í•œ ê¶Œí•œë“¤ì„ ìš”ì²­í•œë‹¤
        // ë‹¨, ì•ˆë“œë¡œì´ë“œ ê³µë¬¸ì— ê¸°ì¬ëœ ëª‡ëª‡ì˜ ê¶Œí•œë“¤ì€ ê°œì¸ì •ë³´ì™€ ê´€ë ¨ëœ ìœ„í—˜ê¶Œí•œìœ¼ë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©ìì—ê²Œ í—ˆë½ì„ ë°›ì•„ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.
        // í—ˆë½ íŒì—…ì„ ìœ„í•´ gradleì— ì¶”ê°€ë¥¼ í•œë‹¤.
        //      implementation 'gun0912.ted:tedpermission:2.2.3'
        setPermission() // ê¶Œí•œ ì²´í¬ ë©”ì†Œë“œ ìˆ˜í–‰

        btn_camera.setOnClickListener {
            takeCapture() // ì‚¬ì§„ ì´¬ì˜
        }
    }

    // ê¶Œí•œ ìš”ì²­ íŒì—… ì„¤ì •
    private fun setPermission() {
        val permission = object : PermissionListener {
            override fun onPermissionGranted() { // ì„¤ì •í•´ë†“ì€ ìœ„í—˜ê¶Œí•œë“¤ì´ ëª¨ë‘ í—ˆìš© ë˜ì—ˆì„ ê²½ìš° ì‹¤í–‰
                Toast.makeText(this@MainActivity, "ê¶Œí•œì´ í—ˆìš© ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
            }

            override fun onPermissionDenied(deniedPermissions: MutableList<String>?) { // ì„¤ì •í•´ë†“ì€ ìœ„í—˜ê¶Œí•œë“¤ì´ í•˜ë‚˜ë¼ë„ ê±°ë¶€ë˜ì—ˆì„ ê²½ìš° ì‹¤í–‰
                Toast.makeText(this@MainActivity, "ê¶Œí•œì´ ê±°ë¶€ ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
            }
        }

        TedPermission.with(this)
            .setPermissionListener(permission)
            .setRationaleMessage("ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ì•±ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì‹œë ¤ë©´ ê¶Œí•œì„ í—ˆìš©í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.")
            .setDeniedMessage("ê¶Œí•œì„ ê±°ë¶€í•˜ì…¨ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. [ì•± ì‹¤í–‰] -> [ê¶Œí•œ] í•­ëª©ì—ì„œ í—ˆìš©í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.")
            .setPermissions(android.Manifest.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, android.Manifest.permission.CAMERA)
            .check()
    }

    // ì‚¬ì§„ ì´¬ì˜
    private fun takeCapture() {
    // ê¸°ë³¸ ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ì•± ì‹¤í–‰
    // ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ê¸°ëŠ¥ë„ Activity í˜•íƒœì´ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì—, Intentë¡œ í™”ë©´ì „í™˜ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤.
        Intent(MediaStore.ACTION_IMAGE_CAPTURE).also { takePictureIntent ->
            takePictureIntent.resolveActivity(packageManager)?.also {
                val photoFile : File? = try {
                    createImageFile()
                } catch (ex : IOException) {
                    null
                }
                photoFile?.also {
                    val photoURI : Uri = FileProvider.getUriForFile(
                        this,
                        "com.example.camera.fileprovider",
                        it
                    )
                    takePictureIntent.putExtra(MediaStore.EXTRA_OUTPUT, photoURI)
                    // startActivityë§Œ ìˆìœ¼ë©´, ë‹¨ìˆœíˆ ì¹´ë©”ë¼ Activityë¡œ ì´ë™ë§Œ í•˜ì§€ë§Œ
                    // startActivityForResultë¥¼ ì“°ë©´, ê°”ë‹¤ê°€ ê²°ê³¼ê°’ì„ ë°›ê³  ëŒì•„ì˜¨ë‹¤
                    startActivityForResult(takePictureIntent, REQUEST_IMAGE_CAPTURE)
                }
            }
        }
    }

    // ì´ë¯¸ì§€ íŒŒì¼ ìƒì„±
    private fun createImageFile(): File {
        val timestamp : String = SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd_HHmmss").format(Date())
        val storageDir : File? = getExternalFilesDir(Environment.DIRECTORY_PICTURES)
        return File.createTempFile("JPEG_${timestamp}_", ".jpg", storageDir)
            .apply { curPhotoPath = absolutePath }
    }

    // startActivityForResultë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•´ì„œ ë°›ì•„ì˜¨ ì‚¬ì§„ ê²°ê³¼ê°’.
    override fun onActivityResult(requestCode: Int, resultCode: Int, data: Intent?) {
        super.onActivityResult(requestCode, resultCode, data)

        // ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë¥¼ ì„±ê³µì ìœ¼ë¡œ ê°€ì ¸ ì™”ë‹¤ë©´
        if(requestCode === REQUEST_IMAGE_CAPTURE && resultCode === Activity.RESULT_OK) {
            val bitmap : Bitmap
            val file = File(curPhotoPath)
            if(Build.VERSION.SDK_INT < 28) { // ì•ˆë“œë¡œì´ë“œ 9.0ë²„ì „ë³´ë‹¤ ë‚®ì„ê²½ìš°
                bitmap = MediaStore.Images.Media.getBitmap(contentResolver, Uri.fromFile(file))
                iv_profile.setImageBitmap(bitmap)
            }else{
                val decode = ImageDecoder.createSource(
                    this.contentResolver,
                    Uri.fromFile(file)
                )
                bitmap = ImageDecoder.decodeBitmap(decode)
                iv_profile.setImageBitmap(bitmap)
            }
            savePhoto(bitmap)
        }
    }

    // ê°¤ëŸ¬ë¦¬ì— ì €ì¥
    private fun savePhoto(bitmap: Bitmap) {
        // ì‚¬ì§„í´ë”ì— ì €ì¥í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•œ ê²½ë¡œ
        val folderPath = Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory().absolutePath + "/Pictures/"
        val timestamp : String = SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd_HHmmss").format(Date())
        val fileName = "${timestamp}.jpeg"
        val folder = File(folderPath)
        if(!folder.isDirectory) { // í•´ë‹¹ ê²½ë¡œì— í´ë”ê°€ ì¡´ì¬í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ”ë‹¤ë©´
            folder.mkdirs()
        }

        // ì €ì¥ì €ë¦¬
        val out = FileOutputStream(folderPath + fileName)
        bitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.JPEG, 100, out)
        Toast.makeText(this, "ì‚¬ì§„ì´ ì €ì¥ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
    }
}

<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"

        android:id="@+id/btn_camera"

        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ì´¬ì˜"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"

        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />

    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/iv_profile"

item.content:encoded:
WebView

  • ë°˜ì‘í˜• í™˜ê²½ì´ êµ¬í˜„ëœ ì›¹ ì–´í”Œë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ì´ë¼ë©´ í•´ë‹¹ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ í†µí•´ ê°„ë‹¨í•˜ê²Œ ì•ˆë“œë¡œì´ë“œ ì•±ìœ¼ë¡œ ë§Œë“¤ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.
// Manifest.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    package="com.example.webview">

    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> ì¸í„°ë„· ì ‘ê·¼ ê¶Œí•œ

    <application
        android:allowBackup="true"
        android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
        android:label="@string/app_name"
        android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"
        android:supportsRtl="true"
        android:usesCleartextTraffic="true" // ì•ˆë“œë¡œì´ë“œ 9.0ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ ì´í›„, HTTPí†µì‹ ì´ë‚˜ WebViewë¥¼ í•  ë•Œ í•´ë‹¹ ì†ì„±ì„ application ì•ˆì— ë„£ì–´ì¤˜ì•¼ ì •ìƒì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‘ë™ëœë‹¤.
        android:theme="@style/Theme.AppCompat.Light.NoActionBar">
        <activity android:name=".MainActivity">
            <intent-filter>
                <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />

                <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
            </intent-filter>
        </activity>
    </application>

</manifest>

// MainActivity.kt
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        // ì›¹ë·° ì…‹íŒ…
        // ìë°”ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ ê¸°ëŠ¥ í—ˆìš©
        wv_webView.settings.javaScriptEnabled = true
        // ì•„ë˜ ë‘ì¤„ì´ ì—†ë‹¤ë©´ ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ì°½ì„ ë„ì›Œë²„ë¦¼
        wv_webView.webViewClient = WebViewClient()
        wv_webView.webChromeClient = WebChromeClient()

        // ì›¹ë·° ì—°ê²°
        wv_webView.loadUrl("https://sangmin802.github.io/haemulhansang/#/")
        // Tip!
        // mainifestsì˜ themaì—ì„œ noactionbarë¥¼ í†µí•´, ìƒë‹¨ ë°”ë¥¼ ì§€ìš¸ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.
    }

    override fun onBackPressed() {
        if(wv_webView.canGoBack()) { // ì›¹ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ì—ì„œ ë’¤ë¡œê°ˆ í˜ì´ì§€ê°€ ì¡´ì¬í•œë‹¤ë©´
            wv_webView.goBack()
        }else{
            super.onBackPressed()
        }
    }
}

item.title: Kotlin Shared Preferences

item.content:encoded:
Shared Preferences

  • ì•ˆë“œë¡œì´ë“œëŠ” ì„œë²„ DBê°€ ì•„ë‹Œ ê°œì¸ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆëŠ” ê°„ì´ ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ê°€ ìˆë‹¤.
// MainActivity.kt
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        // ì•±ì´ í˜¸ì¶œë˜ì—ˆì„ ë•Œ, ì €ì¥ë˜ì–´ìˆë˜ ë°ì´í„° ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°
        loadData()
    }

// ctrl+oë¥¼ í†µí•´ overrideê°€ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ ë©”ì†Œë“œë“¤ì„ ë³¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.
    // ì•±ì´ ì¢…ë£Œë˜ëŠ” ì‹œì ì— í˜¸ì¶œ
    override fun onDestroy() {
        super.onDestroy()

        // ì•±ì´ ì¢…ë£Œë  ë•Œ, ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
        saveData()
    }

    fun saveData() {
        val pref = getSharedPreferences("pref", 0)
        val edit = pref.edit() // ì¶”ê°€ë‚˜ ìˆ˜ì •
        edit.putString("text", et_inputText.text.toString()) // ì²«ë²ˆì§¸ ì¸ìëŠ” í‚¤, ë‘ë²ˆì§¸ ì¸ìëŠ” ì‹¤ì œ ì €ì¥ë˜ëŠ” ê°’
        edit.apply() // ì €ì¥ ì™„ë£Œ
    }

    fun loadData() {
        val pref = getSharedPreferences("pref", 0)
        et_inputText.setText(pref.getString("text", "")) // ì²«ë²ˆì§¸ ì¸ìëŠ” ì°¾ëŠ” í‚¤, ì°¾ëŠ” í‚¤ê°€ ì—†ë‹¤ë©´ ëŒ€ì²´ë˜ëŠ” ê°’
    }
}

item.title: Kotlin Navigation View
item.description: Navigation View í–„ë²„ê±°ë‚˜ ì‚¬ì´ë“œì—ì„œ ë‚˜ì˜¤ëŠ” ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë“œ ë„¤ë¹„ê²Œì´ì…˜ì„ ë§Œë“¤ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. ìˆœì„œ ì— ì¶”ê°€ res í´ë”ì— ë„¤ë¹„ê²Œì´ì…˜ ë©”ë‰´ë¥¼ ë‹¤ë£° menu resources directory ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì¤€ë‹¤. typeì„ menuë¡œ í•´ì¤˜ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. Tipâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Navigation View

  • í–„ë²„ê±°ë‚˜ ì‚¬ì´ë“œì—ì„œ ë‚˜ì˜¤ëŠ” ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë“œ ë„¤ë¹„ê²Œì´ì…˜ì„ ë§Œë“¤ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

ìˆœì„œ

  1. gradleì— ì¶”ê°€

    implementation 'com.google.android.material:material:1.0.0'

  2. res í´ë”ì— ë„¤ë¹„ê²Œì´ì…˜ ë©”ë‰´ë¥¼ ë‹¤ë£° menu resources directory ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì¤€ë‹¤.

    typeì„ menuë¡œ í•´ì¤˜ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. Tip! drawbleì˜ newì—ì„œ â€”assetì„ í†µí•´, ì•ˆë“œë¡œì´ë“œì—ì„œ ì œê³µí•˜ëŠ” ê¸°ë³¸ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë“¤ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

  3. menuë¥¼ êµ¬ì„±í•˜ëŠ” íƒœê·¸ë“¤ì„ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì¤€ë‹¤.

  4. activity_mainì—ì„œ ì™¸ë¶€ íƒœê·¸ë¥¼ constraintê°€ ì•„ë‹Œ, DrawerLayoutìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€ê²½í•´ì¤€ë‹¤

    DrawerLayoutì´ë€ í–„ë²„ê±°, ìƒŒë“œìœ„ì¹˜ë¼ ë¶ˆë¦¬ëŠ” ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒë €ì„ ë•Œ í™”ë©´ ì‚¬ì´ë“œì—ì„œ ìŠ¤ì™€ì´í”„ ë˜ë©° ë‚˜ì˜¤ëŠ” viewë¥¼ ë§í•œë‹¤.

  5. DrawerLayout ë°”ë¡œ ì•„ë˜ì—, material.navigation.NavigationViewíƒœê·¸ë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ê³ , android:layout_gravity="start"ë¥¼ í†µí•´, í™”ë©´ ì™¼ìª½ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¹¼ì¤€ë‹¤.(Endë„ ë¨ ë°©í–¥ì€ ììœ )
// MainActivity.kt
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity(), NavigationView.OnNavigationItemSelectedListener { // Navigation ê´€ë ¨ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë“¤ì„ì„ ìƒì†ë°›ìŒ
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        nav_btn.setOnClickListener {
            // ì™¼ìª½ë°©í–¥ì—ì„œ ë°€ì–´ë¼
            layout_drawer.openDrawer(GravityCompat.START) // START = Left, END = Right
        }

// ë„¤ë¹„ê²Œì´ì…˜ ë·°ì— ì•„ë˜ì˜ ì•„ì´í…œ í´ë¦­ê¸°ëŠ¥ ë¶€ì—¬ (ìƒì†ë°›ì•˜ë˜ í´ë¦­ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ì— overrideí•œê²ƒì´ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì—, this)
        nav_view.setNavigationItemSelectedListener(this)
    }

    override fun onNavigationItemSelected(item: MenuItem): Boolean { // Navigaion ë©”ë‰´ í´ë¦­ ì‹œ ìˆ˜í–‰
        when(item.itemId){ // nav_menuì˜ itemë“¤ì˜ ì•„ì´ë””
            R.id.access -> Toast.makeText(this, "ì ‘ê·¼ì„±", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
            R.id.email -> Toast.makeText(this, "ì´ë©”ì¼", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
            R.id.send -> Toast.makeText(this, "ë©”ì‹œì§€", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
        }
        // ìœ„ì˜ ê³¼ì •ì„ ì§„í–‰í•˜ê³ , navigationì„ ë‹«ì•„ì¤˜
        layout_drawer.closeDrawers()
        return false
    }


// Navê°€ ì¼œì ¸ìˆì„ ë•Œ, ë’¤ë¡œê°€ê¸°ë¥¼ ëˆŒëŸ¬ë„ ì•±ì´ êº¼ì§€ì§€ì•Šê³  Navê°€ ë‹«íˆë„ë¡
    override fun onBackPressed() {
        if(layout_drawer.isDrawerOpen(GravityCompat.START)){ // Navê°€ ì—´ë ¤ìˆëŠ” ìƒíƒœë©´
            layout_drawer.closeDrawers() // Navë§Œ ë‹«ì•„
        }else{
            super.onBackPressed() // ì¼ë°˜ ë°±ë²„íŠ¼ ì‹¤í–‰
        }
    }
}

// nav_menu.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
    <group android:checkableBehavior="single">
        <item
            android:id="@+id/access"
            android:icon="@drawable/ic_baseline_accessibility_24"
            android:title="ì ‘ê·¼ì„±" />
        <item
            android:id="@+id/email"
            android:icon="@drawable/ic_baseline_email_24"
            android:title="ì´ë©”ì¼" />
        <item
            android:id="@+id/send"
            android:icon="@drawable/ic_baseline_send_24"
            android:title="ë©”ì‹œì§€" />
    </group>
</menu>

// activity_main.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:id="@+id/layout_drawer"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent">

        <TextView
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:text="Hello World!"
            app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/nav_btn"
            android:layout_width="50dp"
            android:layout_height="50dp"

Custom Adapter & ListView

// GameChar.kt
package com.example.listview

// í´ë˜ìŠ¤ ëª¨ë¸ ê°ì²´

// list_game_char.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"

    <ImageView

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/tv_detailClass"

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

í•´ë‹¹ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒì„ ë°˜ë³µì‹œí‚¬ adapterë¥¼ ë§Œë“ ë‹¤.

// ì´ê±° Reactí•  ë•Œ, .mapìœ¼ë¡œ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ ë°˜ë³µì‹œí‚¨ê±°ë‘ ë§ì´ ë¹„ìŠ·í•œë“¯í•¨
class GameCharAdapter (
    val context : Context, // activtyì˜ ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ë‹´ê³ ìˆëŠ” ì»¨í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸
    val CharList : ArrayList<GameChar> // GameChar class í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ë‹´ê²¨ì§„ ArrayList
) : BaseAdapter() { // ê¸°ë³¸ adapterê¸°ìˆ ì„ ìƒì†ë°›ìŒ

    // listViewì— ì–´ë–»ê²Œ í™”ë©´ì„ ë¿Œë ¤ì¤„ê²ƒì¸ì§€ êµ¬í˜„
    override fun getView(position: Int, convertView: View?, parent: ViewGroup?): View {
        // ë°˜ë³µì‹œí‚¬ ë‚´ê°€ë§Œë“  ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒ
        // í•´ë‹¹ contextì˜ listViewëŠ” ë‚˜ëŠ” ì´ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒì´ ë°˜ë³µëœê²ƒìœ¼ë¡œ ë°”ê¿€êº¼ì•¼
        val view : View = LayoutInflater.from(context).inflate(R.layout.list_game_char, null)

        // ë‚´ê°€ ë§Œë“¤ì—ˆë˜ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒì—ì„œ ë™ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ê°’ì´ ë°”ë€Œì–´ì•¼ í•  ë¶€ë¶„ë“¤ì„ ê°€ì ¸ì˜´
        val img = view.findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.iv_img) // ImageViewíƒ€ì…ì˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€
        val groupClass = view.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.tv_groupClass) // TextViewíƒ€ì…ì˜ ë©”ì¸í´ë˜ìŠ¤
        val detailClass = view.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.tv_detailClass) // TextViewíƒ€ì…ì˜ ë””í…Œì¼í´ë˜ìŠ¤

        // ë°˜ë³µí•´ì„œ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒì„ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ ë‚¼ ë•Œ, ìˆœì„œì— ë§ëŠ” ìƒì„±ëœ classë“¤ì„ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜´
        val charClass = CharList[position] // ë°˜ë³µìˆœíšŒí•  ë•Œ index

        // ë‚´ê°€ ë§Œë“¤ì—ˆë˜ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒì— ê°’ì„ ë™ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì§€ì •í•´ì¤Œ
        Glide.with(context).load(charClass.img).into(img)
        groupClass.text = charClass.groupClass
        detailClass.text = charClass.detaliClass

        // ì™„ì„±ëœ í•˜ë‚˜ì˜ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒì„ ë°˜í™˜
        return view
    }

    // ë§¤ ìˆœê°„ë§ˆë‹¤ ì–´ë–¤ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ê°€ì ¸ì™€ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ê²ƒì¸ì§€
    override fun getItem(position: Int): Any {
        return CharList[position]
    }

    override fun getItemId(position: Int): Long {
        return 0
    }

    // ì´ ëª‡ê°œì˜ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒ(ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸)ì´ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì¡ŒëŠ”ì§€
    override fun getCount(): Int {
        return CharList.size
    }
}

ListViewì˜ ì–´ëí„°ë¡œ ì„¤ì •í•œë‹¤.

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    val url = "https://cdn-lostark.game.onstove.com/2018/obt/assets/images/pc/information/class/"
    val GameCharList = arrayListOf<GameChar>( // arraylistë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ê»€ë°, GameCharí´ë˜ìŠ¤ íƒ€ì…ë“¤ì„ ë„£ì–´
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_warlord_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Warrior", "Warlord"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_berserker_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Warrior", "Berserker"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_destroyer_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Warrior", "Destroyer"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_holyknight_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Warrior", "Holyknight"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_battlemaster_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Fighter", "Battle Master"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_infighter_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Fighter", "Infighter"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_soulmaster_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Fighter", "Soul Master"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_lancemaster_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Fighter", "Lance Master"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_devilhunter_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Hunter", "Devil Hunter"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_blaster_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Hunter", "Blaster"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_hawkeye_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Hunter", "Hawk Eye"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_scouter_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Hunter", "Scouter"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_bard_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Magician", "Bard"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_summoner_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Magician", "Summoner"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_arcana_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Magician", "Arcana"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_blade_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Assassin", "Blade"),
        GameChar("${url}img_detail_demonic_s.png?a30e28ffc1cfe5cf1991", "Assassin", "Demonic")
    )

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        val Adapter = GameCharAdapter(this, GameCharList)
        listView.adapter = Adapter

        // ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ í´ë¦­ ì‹œ
        listView.onItemClickListener = AdapterView.OnItemClickListener { parent, view, position, id ->
            // ë‚´ê°€ í´ë¦­í•œ ì•„ì´í…œ
            val selectedItem = parent.getItemAtPosition(position) as GameChar // í•´ë‹¹ indexë²ˆì§¸ì˜ GameChar í´ë˜ìŠ¤
            Toast.makeText(this, selectedItem.detaliClass, Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
        }
    }
}

item.description: ImageView & Toast ImageViewë¥¼ í†µí•´, ìì‹ ì´ ê°–ê³ ìˆëŠ” ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë¥¼ ë³´ì—¬ì£¼ê±°ë‚˜, ì™¸ë¶€ ë¼ì´ë¸ŒëŸ¬ë¦¬ë¥¼ í†µí•´ í•´ë‹¹ urlì˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë¥¼ ë³´ì—¬ì¤„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. Toastë¥¼ í†µí•´ í•˜ë‹¨ì—ì„œ ì˜¬ë¼ì˜¤ëŠ” ì•Œë¦¼ê¸€ì„ ì„¤ì •í• ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. alertâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
ImageView & Toast

  • ImageViewë¥¼ í†µí•´, ìì‹ ì´ ê°–ê³ ìˆëŠ” ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë¥¼ ë³´ì—¬ì£¼ê±°ë‚˜, ì™¸ë¶€ ë¼ì´ë¸ŒëŸ¬ë¦¬ë¥¼ í†µí•´ í•´ë‹¹ urlì˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë¥¼ ë³´ì—¬ì¤„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

  • Toastë¥¼ í†µí•´ í•˜ë‹¨ì—ì„œ ì˜¬ë¼ì˜¤ëŠ” ì•Œë¦¼ê¸€ì„ ì„¤ì •í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

    alertê³¼ ë¹„ìŠ·í•œê¸°ëŠ¥? ë‹¨ í•˜ë‹¨ì—ì„œ ì˜¬ë¼ì˜¤ê³  ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆë„ ê°€ëŠ¥

URLì„ í†µí•œ ì´ë¯¸ì§€

  1. build.gradleì˜ dependenciesì— ì•„ë˜ ë‘ê°œì˜ ë§í¬ë¥¼ ì ëŠ”ë‹¤
  2. implementation 'com.github.bumptech.glide:glide:4.11.0'
  3. annotationProcessor 'com.github.bumptech.glide:compiler:4.11.0'
  4. manifestsíŒŒì¼ì— ì¶”ê°€í•˜ì—¬ ì¸í„°ë„· urlì— ì ‘ê·¼í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ í•œë‹¤.
  5. <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE"/>
  6. <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
// MainActivity.kt
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        val url = "https://scontent-gmp1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/117331960_4247747288629673_9203310391566836283_n.jpg?_nc_cat=100&_nc_sid=6e5ad9&_nc_ohc=H1GByJl8wwEAX8FlKmt&_nc_ht=scontent-gmp1-1.xx&oh=fa43c6789b445fde7275304896182b26&oe=5F82C4BF"
        // Glideë¥¼ í†µí•´ í•´ë‹¹ ì•„ì´ë””ì˜ imageView ì£¼ì†Œë¥¼ urlë¡œ ì„¤ì •
        Glide.with(this).load(url).into(iv_loastArk)

        btn_toast.setOnClickListener {
            // ì²«ë²ˆì§¸ ì¸ìëŠ” í˜„ì¬ ì•¡í‹°ë¹„í‹°. ë‘ë²ˆì§¸ì¸ìëŠ” ì¶œë ¥ë˜ëŠ” ê¸€, ì„¸ë²ˆì§¸ëŠ” ìœ ì§€ì‹œê°„
            Toast.makeText(this@MainActivity, "Android with Kotlin", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()

            //  í† ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ë²„íŠ¼ í´ë¦­ì‹œ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ë³€ê²½
            //  ì¡°ê±´ë¬¸ì„ í™œìš©í•˜ì—¬ Toggleë¡œ ì‚´ì§ ì‘ìš©í•´ë³´ì•˜ë‹¤.
            //  res ë””ë ‰í† ë¦¬ì˜ drawble ë””ë ‰í† ë¦¬ì˜ android2
            when(iv_android.getTag()){
                "0" -> {
                    iv_android.setTag("1")
                    iv_android.setImageResource(R.drawable.android)
                }
                "1" -> {
                    iv_android.setTag("0")
                    iv_android.setImageResource(R.drawable.android2)
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
// activity_main.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/iv_loastArk"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.497"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
        tools:srcCompat="@tools:sample/avatars" />

    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/iv_android"
        android:layout_width="200dp"
        android:layout_height="200dp"
        android:tag="1"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.497"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.499"
        app:srcCompat="@drawable/android" />

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/btn_toast"
        android:layout_width="50dp"
        android:layout_height="50dp"
        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
        android:background="@drawable/btn"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.498"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/iv_android" />

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

item.title: Kotlin intent
item.description: Intent activityì™€ activiyê°„ í™”ë©´ì´ë™ ë° ì •ë³´ì „ë‹¬ì€ intentê°ì²´ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ë©´ ëœë‹¤. MainActivity ê²°ê³¼ë¬¼ SubActivity ê²°ê³¼ë¬¼ ì°¸ì¡° í™ìŠ¤ë¡œì´ë“œ Kotlin intent
item.content:encoded:
Intent

  • activityì™€ activiyê°„ í™”ë©´ì´ë™ ë° ì •ë³´ì „ë‹¬ì€ intentê°ì²´ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ë©´ ëœë‹¤.

MainActivity

// MainActivity.kt
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        btn_a.setOnClickListener {
            // ë‹¤ìŒ í™”ë©´ìœ¼ë¡œ ì´ë™í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ intent ê°ì²´ ìƒì„±.
            val intent = Intent(this, SubActivity::class.java)
            // ë³´ë‚´ì§€ëŠ” intentê°ì²´ì— ê°™ì´ë³´ë‚¼ ë³€ìˆ˜ ë‹´ê¸°.
            // intent.putExtra("msg", tv_sendMsg.text.toString())

            // í˜¹ì€, Fragmentì™€ Activity ë™ì¼í•˜ê²Œ bundleOfë©”ì†Œë“œë¥¼ ì´ìš©í•˜ë©´ ë” í¸ë¦¬í•˜ë‹¤.
            val bundle = bundleOf("msg" to tv_sendMsg.text.toString(), "num" to 1)
            intent.putExtras(bundle)
            startActivity(intent) // intentê°ì²´ì— ë‹´ê¸´ activityë¡œ ì´ë™í•œë‹¤.

            finish() // í˜„ì¬ì˜ activityë¥¼ íŒŒê´´í•œë‹¤.
            // ë’¤ë¡œê°€ê¸°ëˆ„ë¥´ë©´ ì•„ì˜ˆ ì•±ì´ êº¼ì§
        }
    }
}
// activity_main.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/tv_sendMsg"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Hello World!"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/btn_a"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_marginTop="32dp"
        android:text="ì„œë¸Œë¡œ ì´ë™"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.498"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/tv_sendMsg" />

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

ê²°ê³¼ë¬¼

SubActivity

// SubActivity.kt
class SubActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_sub)

        // intentê°ì²´ì— msg, num ì†ì„±ì´ ìˆë‹¤ë©´ ì§„í–‰
        if(intent.hasExtra("msg") && intent.hasExtra("num")){
            tv_getMsg.text = intent.getStringExtra("msg")
            tv_getNum.text = intent.getIntExtra("num", 700).toString()
        }
    }

new Vue({
  el : '#todoList',

  data : {
    newTodo : null,
    nextTodoId : 5,
    todoList : [
      {id : 1, text : 'Vue ê³µë¶€í•˜ê¸°'},
      {id : 2, text : 'JavaScript ê³µë¶€í•˜ê¸°'},

      this.todoList = newTodoList;
      this.nextTodoId++;
      this.newTodo=null;
    },
    remove(_id){
      const newTodoList = [...this.todoList].filter(res => res.id!==_id);
      this.todoList = newTodoList;
    }
  }
})

Symbol[iterator]+generator

const obj = {
  1 : 'one',
  2 : 'two',
  3 : 'three'
}

  console.log(a) // obj is not iterable
}
console.log(...obj) // error
  • í˜„ì¬ objëŠ” ë°˜ë³µìˆœíšŒí•  ìˆ˜ ì—†ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ìœ„ì˜ ì—ëŸ¬ê°€ ë°œìƒí•œë‹¤.
  • í•´ê²°í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´, ë°˜ë³µí•  ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” Arrayì˜ í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ë°”ê¾¸ê¸°ìœ„í•´ Object.keys í˜¹ì€ Object.valuesë¡œ ë³€í™˜í•´ì¤˜ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.
  • ìœ„ì²˜ëŸ¼ Object methodë¥¼ í™œìš©í•˜ì—¬ ìƒˆë¡­ê²Œ ë°°ì—´ì„ ë§Œë“œëŠ”ê²ƒì´ ì•„ë‹Œ, Symbol.iteratorë¡œ í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.
const ChangeToIterable = (unIterableObj) => {
  const iter = valuesIter(unIterableObj);
  return {
    [Symbol.iterator] : function(){
      return this; // iteratorê°ì²´ë¥¼ ë°˜í™˜í•¨
    },
    next : function(){
      return iter.next();
    }
  }
};

const valuesIter = function*(unIterableObj){
  for(let key in unIterableObj){
    yield unIterableObj[key];
  }
};

// ì •ìƒì‘ë™ë¨.
for(let a of ChangeToIterable(obj)){
  console.log(a) // one two three
};
